Bhavesu^eb^ sabbabhavesu cittānaṃ, puggalānaṃ vasena ca cittappavatti ^b^bhikkhūnaṃ^eb^^a^M0.0057^ea^ ābhidhammikabhikkhūnaṃ ^b^pāṭavatthāya^eb^ chekabhāvāya mayā pakāsitā. ^b^Evaṃ sabbamidaṃ cittaṃ, bhūmipuggalabhedato evaṃ^eb^ iminā mayā vuttappakārena bhūmipuggalabhedato idaṃ sabbaṃ cittaṃ ^b^bahudhāpi ca^eb^ bahuppakārampi ca hoti. ^b^Iti^eb^ gahaṇaṃ vibhāvinā viññātabbaṃ. ^b^Sakkā vuttānusārena^eb^ mayā vuttassa anusārena ^b^bhedo^eb^ cittabhedo vibhāvinā ^b^ñātuṃ^eb^ vijānituṃ sakkā. Ganthavitthārabhītena mayā ^b^idaṃ^eb^ cittappavattidīpakavacanaṃ saṃkhittaṃ, pubbāparaṃ viloketvā, cintetvā ca punappunaṃ atthaṃ upaparikkhitvā vibhāvinā gahetabbaṃ.

290.^b^Imañcābhidhammāvatāraṃ susāraṃ, varaṃ sattamohandhakārappadīpaṃ^eb^ imañca abhidhammāvatārappakaraṇaṃ ^b^susāraṃ^eb^ sundarasārabhūtaṃ varaṃ sattaandhakārasadise mohe padīpaṃ pajjotappadīpaṃ ^a^V1.0050^ea^^b^yo^eb^ naro sādhukaṃ cinteti vācetipi, taṃ naraṃ rāgadosā ^b^ciraṃ^eb^ cirakālaṃ ^b^nopayanti^eb^ na upagacchanti.
Iti abhidhammāvatāraṭīkāya
Bhūmipuggalacittuppattiniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
Pañcamo paricchedo.
^b^Etesaṃ pana cittānaṃ, ārammaṇamito paraṃ;^eb^
^b^Dassayissāmahaṃ tena, vinā natthi hi sambhavo.^eb^

^b^Ito paraṃ^eb^ ito paricchedato paraṃ ahaṃ etesaṃ pana cittānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ dassayissāmi. ^b^Hi^eb^ kasmā? ^b^Tena vinā^eb^ taṃ ārammaṇaṃ vajjetvā cittānaṃ sambhavo natthi yasmā kāraṇā, tasmā kāraṇā dassayissāmi.
^b^Rūpaṃ^eb^^a^M0.0058^ea^^b^saddaṃ gandhaṃ rasaṃ, phoṭṭhabbaṃ dhammameva ca;^eb^
^b^Chadhā ārammaṇaṃ āhu, chaḷārammaṇakovidā.^eb^
Chaḷārammaṇesu chekā paṇḍitā ārammaṇaṃ ^b^chadhā^eb^ chappakāraṃ ^b^āhu^eb^ kathesuṃ.

293.^b^Tattha bhūte upādāya. Tattha^eb^ tesu ārammaṇesu ^b^bhūte upādāya^eb^ bhūte paṭicca vaṇṇo ^b^catusamuṭṭhito^eb^^a^V1.0051^ea^ kammacittautuāhārasaṅkhātehi catūhi paccayehi ^b^samuṭṭhito^eb^ nibbatto nidassanena saha pavatto paṭighena saha pavatto rūpārammaṇasaññito.

294.^b^Duvidhopi samuddiṭṭho, saddo cittotusambhavo^eb^ saddo duvidhopi muninā samuddiṭṭho cittotusambhavo, saviññāṇakasaddova cittasamuṭṭhito hoti. Kathaṃ? Vacībhedakacittena bhūtāya jātāya bhūmiyā pathavīdhātuyā vikāratā pathavīlakkhaṇabhāvato atithaddhalakkhaṇatā vikāratā nāma. Sā vacīviññatti viññāyatīti viññattiyā upādiṇṇaghaṭṭanassa kammajapathavīdhātuyā ghaṭṭanassa kāraṇaṃ cittajapathavīdhātuyā kammajapathavīdhātuyā ghaṭṭanañca saddo ca apubbaṃ acarimaṃ hoti.
295.^b^Aviññāṇakasaddo yo so^eb^ aviññāṇakasaddo utusamuṭṭhito hoti. Ayaṃ duvidhopi saddo ^b^saddārammaṇataṃ gato^eb^ saddārammaṇabhāvaṃ patto.

296.^b^Dharīyatīti gacchanto^eb^ gacchanto janehi dharīyateti gandho. ^b^Gamu sappa^eb^ gatimhi, ^b^dhara^eb^ dhāraṇe. ^b^Sūcanato^eb^ attano sādhāraṇassa pupphādino vatthussa pakāsanatopi vā gandho nāma. ^b^Gandha^eb^ sūcane. ^b^Ayaṃ^eb^ gandho catūhi samuṭṭhānaṃ etassāti ^b^catusamuṭṭhāno^eb^. Gandhārammaṇasammato.

297.^b^Rasamānā^eb^^a^M0.0059^ea^^b^rasantīti, rasoti parikittito^eb^ janā rasamānā yaṃ dhammajātaṃ ^b^rasanti^eb^ anubhavanti, ^b^iti^eb^ yasmā kāraṇā, tasmā kāraṇā ^b^raso iti^eb^ raso nāma paṇḍitehi parikittito, ^b^so^eb^ raso catusambhūto rasārammaṇanāmako.
298.^b^Phusīyatīti phoṭṭhabbaṃ^eb^ yaṃ dhammajātaṃ janehi phusīyatīti tasmā phoṭṭhabbaṃ, pathavītejavāyavo. Taṃ phoṭṭhabbaṃ catusambhūtaṃ phoṭṭhabbārammaṇaṃ mataṃ.

299.^b^Sabbaṃ nāmañca rūpañca, hitvā rūpādipañcakaṃ^eb^ rūpādipañcakaṃ hitvā sabbaṃ ^b^nāmañca^eb^ cittacetasikanibbānanāmañca ^b^rūpañca^eb^ pañcapasādasukhumarūpañca ^b^lakkhaṇāni ca^eb^ aniccadukkhaanattalakkhaṇāni ca paññatti ca dhammārammaṇasaññitaṃ.

300.^b^Chārammaṇāni^eb^^a^V1.0052^ea^^b^labbhanti, kāmāvacarabhūmiyaṃ^eb^ kāmāvacarabhūmiyaṃ chārammaṇāni labbhanti. ^b^Tīṇi^eb^ rūpāvacare rūpasaddadhammārammaṇavasena labbhanti. Arūpe pana ekekaṃ dhammārammaṇaṃ labbhati.

301-3.^b^Khaṇavatthuparittattā, āpāthaṃ na vajanti ye^eb^ ye rūpādayo pañca visayā khaṇavatthuparittattā pañcārammaṇānaṃ khaṇassa parittattā mandattā tesaṃ appāyukattā vatthuparittattā pañcārammaṇānaṃ atikhuddakavatthukattā āpāthaṃ pañcadvāresu pākaṭabhāvaṃ na vajanti, pañcapasādesu ghaṭṭanakiccaṃ na sādhenti, ^b^te^eb^ rūpādayo pañca visayā dhammārammaṇaṃ honti. Iti ^b^yesaṃ^eb^ ekaccānaṃ ācariyānaṃ mataṃ hoti. ^b^Kirā^eb^ti anussavanatthe nipāto. ^b^Te paṭikkhipitabbāva^eb^ te evaṃ vādino ekacce ācariyā paṭikkhipitabbā, mayā paṭisedhitabbā. Kasmā? Cakkhuviññāṇaṃ sotaviññāṇassa gocarabhūtaṃ ^b^saddaṃ^eb^ na paṭianubhoti, sotaviññāṇaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa gocarabhūtaṃ ^a^M0.0060^ea^ rūpaṃ na paṭianubhoti. Iti ^b^aññamaññassa gocaraṃ^eb^ neva paccanubhontānaṃ ^b^tesaṃ^eb^ pañcannaṃ cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ viññāṇānaṃ tañca gocaraṃ manodhātumanoviññāṇadhātusaṅkhātaṃ javanaṃ pana paccanubhoti. ^b^Iti^eb^ vacanassa bhagavatā vuttattā paṭikkhipitabbā. ^b^Rūpādayo pana^eb^ visayā rūpādipañcārammaṇāni eva honti.

304-6.^b^Dibbacakkhādiñāṇānaṃ, rūpādīneva gocarā^eb^ tāni rūpādīni eva gocarā dibbacakkhādiñāṇānaṃ anāpāthagatānaṃ eva pākaṭabhāvaṃ appattāneva. ^b^Itipi^eb^ vacanaṃ vuttaṃ na yujjati. ^b^Yaṃ^eb^ dhammajātaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ bhavantaṃ, ^b^taṃ^eb^ dhammajātaṃ ^b^kathaṃ^eb^ kena pakārena dhammārammaṇaṃ bhaveyya? ^b^Evaṃ sati^eb^ rūpārammaṇassa dhammārammaṇatte sati ^b^etesaṃ^eb^ rūpārammaṇadhammārammaṇānaṃ niyamopi ^b^kathaṃ bhave^eb^ kena pakārena bhaveyya? ^b^Sabbaṃ ārammaṇaṃ etaṃ^eb^ etaṃ sabbaṃ ārammaṇaṃ ^b^chabbidhaṃ^eb^ chappakāraṃ bhagavatā samudīritaṃ. Taṃ parittattikādīnaṃ vasena bahuppakārehi mataṃ.

307.^b^Sabbo kāmavipāko ca^eb^ sabbo tevīsatikāmavipāko ca ^b^kriyāhetudvayampi ca^eb^ manodhātuhasituppādavasena kiriyāhetudvayampi cāti pañcavīsati cittuppādā ^b^ekantaparittārammaṇā^eb^ ekantakāmāvacarārammaṇā ^b^siyuṃ^eb^ bhaveyyuṃ.

308-10.^b^Iṭṭhādibhedā pañceva, rūpasaddādayo pana^eb^ dvipañcannaṃ viññāṇānaṃ ^b^paṭipāṭiyā^eb^ anukkamena gocarā honti. ^b^Rūpādipañcakaṃ sabbaṃ, manodhātuttayassa tu^eb^ manodhātuttayassa pana sabbaṃ ^a^V1.0053^ea^ rūpādipañcakaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hoti, etesaṃ terasannaṃ pana cittānaṃ rūpakkhandhova ^b^gocaro^eb^ ārammaṇaṃ hoti. ^b^Nārūpaṃ^eb^ nāmaṃ ārammaṇaṃ na karonti. ^b^Na ca paññattiṃ^eb^ paññattiṃ ārammaṇaṃ na karonti. ^b^Nātītaṃ^eb^ atītaṃ ārammaṇaṃ na karonti ^a^M0.0061^ea^. ^b^Na canāgataṃ^eb^ anāgataṃ ārammaṇaṃ na karonti eva. ^b^Hi^eb^ saccaṃ vattamāno gocaro etesaṃ dvipañcaviññāṇānaṃ, manodhātuttayassa cāti terasannaṃ cittānaṃ taṃ ārammaṇaṃ vattamānaṃ eva paccuppannaṃ eva.

311.^b^Terasetāni cittāni, jāyante kāmadhātuyaṃ etāni^eb^ terasa cittāni kāmadhātuyaṃ jāyanti, rūpāvacare puññajāni cakkhusotaviññāṇasampaṭicchanāni, kiriyāmanodhātu cāti ^b^cattāri^eb^ cittāni jāyanti. ^b^Arūpisu^eb^ arūpabhūmīsu ^b^neva kiñcipi^eb^ ekampi cittaṃ neva jāyati.

312-3.^b^Mahāpākānamaṭṭhannaṃ^eb^ aṭṭhannaṃ mahāvipākānaṃ pavattiyaṃ chasu dvāresu tadārammaṇakiccānaṃ rūpādichaparittāni gocarā. ^b^Santīraṇattayassapi^eb^ pavattiyaṃ pañcadvāre santīraṇattayakiccassa, chadvāresu tadālambaṇakiccassa ca rūpādichaparittāni gocarā. ^b^Rūpādayo parittā cha, hasituppādagocarā^eb^ hasituppādassa rūpādayo cha parittā gocarā honti. ^b^Pañcadvāre paṭuppannā^eb^ pañcasu dvāresu ye gocarā paccuppannā, manodvāre ^b^tikālikā^eb^ ye gocarā tikālikā tīsu kālesu niyuttā.

314-5.^b^Dutiyāruppacittañca, catutthāruppamānasaṃ^eb^ kusalavipākakiriyāvasena ^b^chabbidhaṃ^eb^ cittaṃ mahaggatagocaraṃ ^b^niyataṃ^eb^ niyatārammaṇaṃ hoti, taṃ chabbidhaṃ cittaṃ mahaggatagocaraṃ pubbe attanā adhigataākāsānañcāyatanaākiñcaññāyatanakusalārammaṇaṃ, tesu dve dutiyacatutthāruppapākā ‘‘yassa yassa kusalajhānassa yaṃ yaṃ ārammaṇaṃ gahetvā brahmaloke paṭisandhi hotī’’ti vacanato sakasakakusalassa ārammaṇaṃ eva tesaṃ vipākānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hoti. ^b^Nibbānārammaṇattā hi, ekantena anaññato^eb^ aṭṭhānāsavacittānaṃ ^b^appamāṇova^eb^ nibbānaṃ eva gocaraṃ ārammaṇaṃ hoti ^a^M0.0062^ea^. ^b^Hi^eb^ kasmā kāraṇā? ^b^Nibbānārammaṇattā, na aññato^eb^ ārammaṇato.

316-320.^b^Cattāro ñāṇahīnā ca, kāmāvacarapuññato^eb^ kāmāvacarakusalavasena cattāro ñāṇahīnā ca ^b^kriyato^eb^ kiriyavasena cattāro ñāṇahīnā ca dvādasākusalāni ca te parittārammaṇā ceva mahaggatagocarā ca, te na vattabbā ca honti. Kasmā? Paññattārammaṇattā ^a^V1.0054^ea^. ^b^Cattāro ñāṇasaṃyuttā, puññato^eb^ kusalavasena cattāro ñāṇasampayuttā, ^b^kriyato^eb^ kiriyavasena cattāro ñāṇasampayuttā ca tathā abhiññādvayañca kiriyāvoṭṭhabbanampi ca ekādasannaṃ etesaṃ cittānaṃ gocaro parittamahaggataappamāṇavasena ^b^tividho^eb^ hoti. ^b^Ime^eb^ ekādasa na vattabbāpi honti. Kasmā? Paññattārammaṇattā. ^b^Yāni vuttāvasesāni^eb^ vuttato cittato sesāni yāni cittāni, tāni na vattabbārammaṇānīti vibhāvinā viññeyyāni.
Parittārammaṇattikaṃ samattaṃ.
^b^Dutiyāruppacittañca, catutthāruppamānasaṃ;^eb^
^b^Chabbidhaṃ pana ekantaatītārammaṇaṃ siyā.^eb^

322-6.^b^Viññāṇānaṃ dvipañcannaṃ^eb^ dvinnaṃ pañcaviññāṇānaṃ, manodhātuttayassa ca terasannaṃ cittānaṃ gocarā rūpādayo pañca dhammā paccuppannāva, aṭṭha kāmamahāvipākā tadārammaṇakiccavasena atītānāgatapaccuppannagocarā, cutikiccavasena atītārammaṇā, paṭisandhibhavaṅgakiccavasena paccuppannātītārammaṇā. Somanassasantīraṇaṃ santīraṇakiccavasena paccuppannārammaṇaṃ. Tadārammaṇakiccavasena paccuppannānāgatātītārammaṇaṃ. Sesasantīraṇadvayaṃ santīraṇakiccavasena paccuppannārammaṇaṃ ^a^M0.0063^ea^, tadārammaṇakiccavasena paccuppannānāgatātītārammaṇaṃ, cutikiccavasena atītārammaṇaṃ, paṭisandhibhavaṅgakiccavasena paccuppannātītārammaṇaṃ. Hasituppādacittaṃ javanakiccavasena paccuppannātītānāgatagocaraṃ. ^b^Iti^eb^ ete dvādasa mānasā pana ^b^siyātītārammaṇā^eb^ atītārammaṇā siyuṃ. ^b^Paccuppannānāgatagocarā^eb^ paccuppannārammaṇā anāgatārammaṇā siyuṃ. Kāme vīsati kusalākusalā ^b^kriyato^eb^ kiriyavasena kāme nava mānasā, voṭṭhabbaṃ voṭṭhabbanakiccavasena paccuppannārammaṇaṃ, āvajjanakiccavasena tikālārammaṇaṃ. Mahākiriyamānasā javanakiccavasena tikālārammaṇā, sante paññattikāle navattabbārammaṇā. Dve abhiññāmānasāpi abhiññākiccavasena atītādigocarā siyuṃ. ^b^Ime^eb^ mānasā paññattikālepi sante navattabbā bhavanti. Rūpārūpabhavesu mayā vuttato ^b^sesāni sabbāni^eb^ cittāni ^b^atītārammaṇādinā^eb^ atītārammaṇādivasena paṇḍitena ^b^na vattabbāni^eb^ na kathitabbāni honti eva, paññattārammaṇāni eva hontīti attho.

327.^b^Kāmato^eb^^a^V1.0055^ea^^b^ca kriyā pañca^eb^ kāmāvacaravasena pañca kiriyā, ^b^rūpato^eb^ rūpāvacaravasena ^b^pañcamī kriyā^eb^ abhiññācittaṃ, etesaṃ channaṃ cittānaṃ natthi ^b^kiñci^eb^ ekampi ^b^agocaraṃ^eb^ anārammaṇaṃ, sabbārammaṇanti attho. ‘‘Pañcamī kriyā’’ti vacanaṃ abhiññācittavasena vuttaṃ. Suddhajhānassa pañcamarūpakiriyassa paññattārammaṇaṃ evāti veditabbaṃ.
328. Nibbānañca catubbidhaṃ phalaṃ, maggaṃ rūpañca ^b^arūpaṃ^eb^ cittacetasikasaṅkhātaṃ nāmañca gocaraṃ kātuṃ yāni cittāni sakkonti, tāni cittāni me vada, ācariya, tāni mayhaṃ kathehi.

329-30.^b^Cattāro ñāṇasaṃyuttā, puññato^eb^ puññavasena cattāro ñāṇasampayuttā, ^b^kriyato tathā^eb^ kiriyavasena ^a^M0.0064^ea^ cattāro ñāṇasampayuttā, dve abhiññāmānasā, kiriyāvoṭṭhabbanampi cāti ekādasa cittāni nibbānañca phalañca maggañca rūpañca ^b^arūpaṃ^eb^ nāmañca gocaraṃ kātuṃ sakkonti.

331-4.^b^Cittesu pana sabbesu^eb^ yāni cittāni arahattaphalaṃ arahattamaggaṃ gocaraṃ kātuṃ sakkonti, ^b^tāni kati cittāni me vada^eb^ tāni mayhaṃ tvaṃ kathehi. ^b^Sabbesu pana cittesu, cha ca cittāni me suṇa^eb^, bho bhaddamukha, tvaṃ mayhaṃ vacanaṃ suṇohi, sabbesu pana cittesu cha cittāni arahattaphalaṃ arahattamaggaṃ gocaraṃ kātuṃ sakkonti. Cattāro ñāṇasaṃyuttā, kiriyā ca voṭṭhabbanampi ca kiriyābhiññāmano cāti cha ca cittāni gocaraṃ kātuṃ sakkonti. ^b^Puññato^eb^ puññavasena cattāro ñāṇasampayuttā, ^b^puññato^eb^ puññavasena abhiññācittañca arahattaphalaṃ maggaṃ gocaraṃ kātuṃ na sakkonti.

335-8.^b^Arahato^eb^ khīṇāsavassa maggacittaṃ phalamānasaṃ vā puthujjanā vā sekkhā vā vijānituṃ na sakkonti. Kasmā kāraṇā? Puthujjano sotāpannassa mānasaṃ na jānāti, sotāpanno sakadāgāmissa mānasaṃ na jānāti, sakadāgāmī anāgāmissa mānasaṃ na jānāti, anāgāmī arahantassa mānasaṃ na jānāti. ^b^Heṭṭhimo heṭṭhimo^eb^ puggalo ^b^uparūpari^eb^ ṭhitassa puggalassa mānasaṃ neva jānāti, ^b^uparūpari^eb^ ṭhito puggalopi heṭṭhimassa heṭṭhimassa puggalassa mānasaṃ jānāti.

339-342.^b^Yo^eb^^a^V1.0056^ea^^b^dhammo yassa dhammassa^eb^ ārammaṇaṃ hoti, ^b^taṃ^eb^ ārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ ekaṃ uddharitvā ito paraṃ pavakkhāmi. ^b^Kusalārammaṇaṃ kāme^eb^ kāme aṭṭhavidhaṃ kusalaṃ aṭṭhavidhassa kāmāvacara^b^kusalassa^eb^ ārammaṇaṃ hoti. Kathaṃ ^a^M0.0065^ea^? Pubbeva kataṃ aṭṭhavidhaṃ mahākusalaṃ pacchā somanassasahagatañāṇasampayuttacittadvayena vā somanassasahagatañāṇavippayuttacittadvayena vā upekkhāsahagatañāṇasampayuttadvayena vā upekkhāsahagatañāṇavippayuttadvayena vā anussaraṇakaālādīsu tassa aṭṭhavidhassa kusalassa javanakiccavasena ārammaṇaṃ hoti, vippaṭisārakālādīsu dvādasavidhassa ^b^akusalassa^eb^ ārammaṇaṃ hoti, kusalassa abhiññāmānasassa ca kiriyassa abhiññāmānasassa ca ārammaṇaṃ hoti, ekādasavidhassa kāmāvacaravipākassa tadārammaṇavasena ārammaṇaṃ hoti. ^b^Tathā kāmakriyassā^eb^ti javanakiccavasena hasanassa āvajjanakiccavasena voṭṭhabbanassa javanakiccavasena mahākiriyassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti, etesaṃ channaṃ rāsīnaṃ ārammaṇaṃ ^b^siyā^eb^ bhaveyya. Rūpāvacarapuññāni pañca ^b^tato^eb^ charāsito kāmavipākaṃ vajjetvā pañcannaṃ rāsīnaṃ ārammaṇāni honti. Tadā lobhamūlamohamūlavasena attanā paṭiladdhajhānānaṃ anussaraṇakāle tassa dasavidhassa akusalassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti, tihetukapaṭisandhino sattassa jhānato parihīnassa jhānaṃ paccavekkhato jhānārammaṇaṃ domanassayuttaṃ hoti, tadā tassa paṭighadvayassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti. ^b^Kāmakriyassā^eb^ti ekantaparittārammaṇāni kiriyāmanodhātuhasanāni vajjetvā āvajjanakiccavasena voṭṭhabbanassa, javanakiccavasena mahākiriyassa ca ārammaṇaṃ hoti.

343.^b^Āruppakusalañcāpi, tebhūmakusalassa ca^eb^ mahākusalassa ca abhiññākiccavasena pañcamarūpakusalassa ca dutiyacatutthaarūpakusalassa ca ^b^tebhūmakakriyassāpi^eb^ voṭṭhabbanassa mahākiriyassa ca abhiññākiccavasena pañcamarūpakiriyassa ca dutiyacatutthāruppakiriyassa ca ārammaṇaṃ hoti, dutiyāruppakiriyassa ca paṭhamāruppakiriyāya ārammaṇena ^a^M0.0066^ea^ bhavitabbaṃ, catutthāruppakiriyassa ca tatiyāruppakiriyāya ārammaṇena bhavitabbaṃ, evañca sati kathaṃ paṭhamāruppakusalaṃ dutiyāruppakiriyassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti, tatiyāruppakusalañca catutthāruppakiriyassa ārammaṇaṃ hotīti ce vattabbaṃ, yadā puthujjanayogī vā sekkho vā yogī rūpasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhahitvā ākāsānañcāyatanasaṅkhātaṃ paṭhamāruppasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā vītarāgo hutvā attanā adhigatā samāpattiyo gahetvā puthujjanasekkhakāle attanā anadhigataṃ dutiyaṃ arūpasamāpattiṃ samāpajji, tadā khīṇāsavakāle ^a^V1.0057^ea^ samāpajjitaṃ dutiyaṃ arūpakiriyaṃ paṭhamāruppakusalaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karoti, evaṃ paṭhamāruppakusalaṃ dutiyāruppakiriyassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti.

Yadā yogī rūpasamāpattiyo samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhahitvā paṭhamāruppakusalaṃ dutiyāruppakusalaṃ tatiyāruppakusalañca samāpajjitvā khīṇāsavo hutvā attanā adhigatā samāpattiyo gahetvā attanā anadhigataṃ catutthaṃ arūpasamāpattiṃ samāpajji, tadā catutthāruppakiriyā tatiyāruppakusalaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karoti, evaṃ catutthāruppakiriyassa tatiyāruppakusalaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hoti, pacchā khīṇāsavakāle samāpajjitā rūpārūpasamāpattiyo honti. Yathā hoti, ^b^tathā eva^eb^ akusalassapi ārammaṇaṃ hoti.

344-7.^b^Arūpāvacarapākāna^eb^nti jātiniddhāraṇaṃ, catutthadutiyānaṃ arūpapākānampi ārammaṇaṃ hoti, ‘‘catutthadutiyāna’’nti vattabbe tiyānaṃ-saddassa lopaṃ katvā ^b^‘‘catutthadū’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ, tadā dvinnaṃ arūpapākānaṃ paṭhamāruppatatiyāruppajavanāni ārammaṇāni honti, ‘‘yassa kusalassa jhānassa yaṃ ārammaṇaṃ gahetvā brahmaloke paṭisandhi hotī’’ti vacanato sakasakakusalānaṃ ārammaṇabhūtāni ^a^M0.0067^ea^ ākāsānañcāyatanaākiñcaññāyatanāni tesaṃ dutiyacatutthāruppapākānaṃ ārammaṇāni honti, evaṃ arūpakusalaṃ imesaṃ aṭṭharāsīnaṃ ārammaṇapaccayo hoti. ^b^Apariyāpannapuññampi^eb^ catubbidhalokuttarakusalampi ^b^kāmāvacarato^eb^ kāmāvacaravasena ^b^kusalassa^eb^ ñāṇasampayuttamahākusalassa ca ^b^kriyassa^eb^ voṭṭhabbanassa, ñāṇasampayuttato kiriyassa ca ^b^rūpato^eb^ rūpāvacaravasena pañcamassa rūpakusalassa ca pañcamassa rūpakiriyassa cāti catunnaṃ rāsīnaṃ ārammaṇaṃ sadā hoti, ayamettha adhippāyo – sekkhānaṃ ñāṇasampayuttamahākusalassa, voṭṭhabbanassa, pañcamassa rūpakusalassa ca tividhaṃ lokuttarapuññaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hoti. Khīṇāsavassa voṭṭhabbanassa, ñāṇasampayuttamahākiriyassa, pañcamassa rūpakiriyassa ca arahattapuññaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hoti. Yathā ^b^tathā eva^eb^ sabbaṃ akusalaṃ ^b^kāmāvacarato^eb^ kāmāvacaravasena ^b^kusalassa^eb^ mahākusalassa, ^b^kriyassa^eb^ hasanavoṭṭhabbanamahākiriyassa ca ^b^rūpāvacarato^eb^ pana rūpāvacaravasena pañcamassa rūpakusalassa, pañcamassa rūpakiriyassa ca ārammaṇaṃ hoti, yathā ^b^tathā eva^eb^ sabbassa akusalassa ca kāmāvacaravipākānaṃ tadārammaṇakiccavasena ekādasannañcāti channaṃ rāsīnaṃ ārammaṇaṃ bhagavatā īritaṃ.

348-352.^b^Vipākārammaṇaṃ^eb^^a^V1.0058^ea^^b^kāme^eb^ sabbaṃ vipākārammaṇaṃ ^b^kāmāvacaratopi^eb^ kāmāvacaravasenapi ^b^kusalassa^eb^ mahākusalassa, ^b^kriyassa^eb^ hasanavoṭṭhabbanamahākiriyassa ca ^b^rūpāvacarato ceva^eb^ rūpāvacaravasena ca eva pañcamassa rūpakusalassa, pañcamassa rūpakiriyassa ca ^b^kāmāvacarapākānaṃ^eb^ kāmāvacaravipākānaṃ ekādasannañca tatheva akusalassa ca channaṃ rāsīnaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hoti. Rūpe vipākārammaṇaṃ ^b^kāmāvacaratopi ca^eb^ kāmāvacaravasenapi ca ^b^kusalassa^eb^ mahākusalassa ^a^M0.0068^ea^, ^b^kriyassa ca^eb^ voṭṭhabbanamahākiriyassa ca ^b^rūpāvacarato ceva^eb^ rūpāvacaravasena ca eva kusalassa ca apuññassa cāti pañcannaṃ rāsīnaṃ gocaro hoti, arūpāvacarapākesu ayaṃ nayo bhagavatā mato. Vaṭṭe na pariyāpannā nappaviṭṭhāti ^b^apariyāpannā,^eb^ tesaṃ puggalānaṃ pākāpi ^b^kāmato^eb^ kāmāvacaravasena ^b^kusalassa^eb^ ñāṇasampayuttamahākusalassa, ^b^kriyassa ca^eb^ voṭṭhabbanañāṇasampayuttamahākiriyassa ca ^b^rūpatopi^eb^ rūpāvacaravasenapi ^b^kusalassa^eb^ pañcamassa rūpakusalassa, ^b^kriyassa ca^eb^ pañcamassa rūpakiriyassa ca evaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hotīti. Etthāyamadhippāyo apariyāpannapuññe vuttanayeneva veditabbo.

353-6. Kāme idaṃ sabbakiriyacittaṃ ^b^kāmāvacaratopi ca^eb^ kāmāvacaravasenapi ca ^b^kusalassa^eb^ mahākusalassa, ^b^kriyassa ca^eb^ hasanavoṭṭhabbanamahākiriyassa ca ^b^rūpāvacarato ceva^eb^ rūpāvacaravasena ca eva ^b^kusalassa^eb^ pañcamassa rūpakusalassa, ^b^kriyassa ca^eb^ pañcamassa rūpakiriyassa ca ekādasakāmāvacarapākassa ca tatheva akusalassa ca etesaṃ channaṃ rāsīnaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hoti. ^b^Yaṃ kriyāmānasaṃ rūpe^eb^ rūpāvacare yaṃ kiriyāmānasaṃ, ^b^kāmapākaṃ tato vinā tato^eb^ rāsito kāmapākaṃ ^b^vinā^eb^ vajjetvā pañcannaṃ pana rāsīnaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hoti. Kāmāvacarato kāmāvacaravasena kiriyassa voṭṭhabbanamahākiriyassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti, hasanaṃ ekantaparittārammaṇattā rūpakiriyaṃ ārammaṇaṃ na karoti. ^b^Kriyācittaṃ panāruppe^eb^ arūpakiriyācittaṃ pana tesaṃ pañcannaṃ eva ca rāsīnaṃ ^b^āruppakriyassāpi^eb^ paṭhamāruppakiriyaṃ dutiyāruppakiriyassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti, tatiyāruppakiriyaṃ catutthāruppakiriyassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti. Iti channaṃ rāsīnaṃ gocaro hotiyeva.
^b^Rūpaṃ^eb^^a^M0.0069^ea^^b^catusamuṭṭhānaṃ, rūpārammaṇasaññitaṃ;^eb^
^b^Kāmāvacarapuññassa, tatheva kusalassa ca;^eb^
^b^Abhiññādvayacittassa, kāmapākakriyassa ca.^eb^
Dvicakkhuviññāṇamanodhātudvayasantīraṇattayamahāpākassa ^a^V1.0059^ea^ ca kāmakiriyassa cāti ekādasavidhassa kāmakiriyassa ca channaṃ etesaṃ rāsīnaṃ ārammaṇapaccayo hoti.

359-360.^b^Nibbānārammaṇaṃ kāmarūpāvacarato^eb^ kāmarūpāvacaravasena sekkhānaṃ ñāṇasampayuttamahākusalassa, rūpāvacaravasena pañcamassa rūpakusalassa ca kāmarūpakiriyassa ca khīṇāsavānaṃ voṭṭhabbanañāṇasampayuttamahākiriyassa ca pañcamarūpakiriyassa ca ^b^ubhayassāpi^eb^ cittassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti. ^b^Apariyāpannato ceva^eb^ lokuttaravasena ca eva phalassa, kusalassa ca etesaṃ channaṃ rāsīnaṃ ārammaṇapaccayo hoti.

361-2.^b^Nānappakārakaṃ sabbaṃ, paññattārammaṇaṃ pana tebhūmakassa puññassa^eb^ mahākusalassa, suddhajhānassa pañcavidhassa rūpakusalassa, paṭhamāruppatatiyāruppakusalassa ca tatheva akusalassa ca ^b^rūpārūpavipākassa^eb^ sabbassa rūpavipākassa, paṭhamāruppatatiyāruppavipākassa ca ^b^tebhūmakakriyassa ca^eb^ hasanavoṭṭhabbanamahākiriyassa sabbassa rūpakiriyassa, paṭhamāruppatatiyāruppakiriyassa cāti navannaṃ pana rāsīnaṃ ārammaṇapaccayo hoti.

363-4.^b^Rūpārammaṇikā dve tu^eb^ dve cittuppādā rūpārammaṇikā, ^b^dve dve saddādigocarā^eb^ dve dve cittuppādā saddārammaṇādigocarā, ^b^tayo^eb^ manodhātusaṅkhātā ^b^cittuppādā^eb^ pañcārammaṇikā nāma matā bhagavatā. ^b^Idha^eb^ imasmiṃ kāmāvacarādhikāre ^a^M0.0070^ea^^b^ekacattālīseva^eb^ cittuppādā chaḷārammaṇikā matā. Ayaṃ kāmāvacaracittānaṃ ārammaṇakkamo.

365-9.^b^Pañcābhiññā vivajjetvā, rūpārūpā anāsavā^eb^ ime sabbe cittuppādā dhammārammaṇagocarā honti. Paṭhamāruppakusalaṃ dutiyāruppacetaso kusalassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti, dutiyāruppacetaso vipākassa ca ārammaṇaṃ hoti, dutiyāruppacetaso kiriyassa ca ārammaṇaṃ hoti. Dutiyāruppacetaso kiriyassa paṭhamāruppakusalārammaṇabhāve kāraṇaṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva. ^b^Paṭhamāruppapākoyaṃ, dutiyāruppacetaso^eb^ kusalassa ca dutiyāruppacetaso vipākassa ca dutiyāruppacetaso kiriyassa ca ārammaṇaṃ na hoti. ^b^Hi^eb^ kasmā? Tesaṃ dutiyāruppakusalavipākakiriyānaṃ paṭhamāruppakusalārammaṇattā. ^b^Paṭhamaṃ tu kriyācittaṃ^eb^ paṭhamaṃ kiriyācittaṃ pana dutiyāruppacetaso puññassa ārammaṇaṃ na hoti. Dutiyāruppacetaso vipākassa ārammaṇaṃ na ^a^V1.0060^ea^ hoti. Rūpārūpabhavesu hi khīṇāsavā vipākacittāni cutivasena sakasakakusalānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karonti. ^b^Paṭhamaṃ tu kriyācittaṃ^eb^ pana dutiyāruppacetaso kiriyassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti. ^b^Iti^eb^ evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena cittānaṃ ārammaṇuppatti ^b^vibhāvinā^eb^ dhīrena ñeyyā.

370-3.^b^Puthujjanassa sekkhassa, arūpārammaṇaṃ dvidhā^eb^ dvippakāraṃ kusalaṃ ^b^kusalassa^eb^ dutiyāruppakusalassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti, ^b^taṃ^eb^ paṭhamāruppakusalaṃ dutiyāruppavipākassa ārammaṇaṃ ^b^siyā^eb^ bhaveyya. ^b^Khīṇāsavassa bhikkhussa, paṭhamāruppamānasaṃ^eb^ ārammaṇaṃ ^b^tidhā^eb^ tippakāraṃ hoti. ^b^Iti^eb^ vacanaṃ mahesinā vuttaṃ. ^b^Kriyassāpi^eb^ dutiyāruppakiriyassāpi paṭhamāruppakiriyā ārammaṇaṃ hoti. ^b^Kusalampi^eb^ paṭhamāruppakusalampi dutiyāruppakiriyassa ca ārammaṇaṃ hoti. ^b^Kusalaṃ^eb^^a^M0.0071^ea^ paṭhamāruppakusalaṃ dutiyāruppavipākassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti. ^b^Evaṃ^eb^ iminā mayā vuttappakārena paṭhamāruppamānasaṃ ārammaṇaṃ tidhā hoti. Tatiyāruppacittampi catutthāruppacetaso kusalassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti, catutthāruppacetaso vipākassa ca taṃ ārammaṇaṃ hoti. ^b^Evameva^eb^ yathā paṭhamāruppamānasaṃ ārammaṇaṃ dvidhā hoti, evameva tathā tatiyāruppacittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ dvidhā hoti. Yathā paṭhamāruppamānasaṃ ārammaṇaṃ tidhā hoti, ^b^evameva^eb^ tathā tatiyāruppacittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ tidhā siyā.

374.^b^Yaṃ yaṃ pana idhārabbha idha^eb^ imasmiṃ adhikāre yaṃ yaṃ gocaraṃ ārabbha paṭicca ^b^ye ye^eb^ cittuppādā jāyanti, ^b^so so^eb^ gocaro ^b^tesañca tesañca^eb^ cittuppādānaṃ ārammaṇapaccayo hoti.
375. Yo pana naro ^b^imassa^eb^ abhidhammāvatārassa kira pāraṃ duttaraṃ ^b^idha^eb^ imasmiṃ loke uttarati, so naro abhidhammamahaṇṇave pāraṃ duttaraṃ uttaraṃ uttarati eva.
Iti abhidhammāvatāraṭīkāya
Ārammaṇavibhāgavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
Chaṭṭho paricchedo.
^b^Anantañāṇena^eb^^a^V1.0061^ea^^b^niraṅgaṇena,^eb^
^b^Guṇesinā kāruṇikena tena;^eb^
^b^Vutte vipāke matipāṭavatthaṃ,^eb^
^b^Vipākacittappabhavaṃ suṇātha.^eb^

Yena ^a^M0.0072^ea^ jinena anantañāṇena nikkilesena guṇesinā kāruṇikena ^b^tena^eb^ jinena vutte vipākasmiṃ ^b^matipāṭavatthaṃ^eb^ matichekabhāvatthāya ^b^vipākacittappabhavaṃ^eb^ mayā bhaṇamānaṃ vipākacittappavattiṃ tumhe suṇātha.
377.^b^Ekūnatiṃsa kammāni,^eb^ pākā dvattiṃsa bhagavatā dassitā, kammāni tīsu dvāresu dissare, vipākā ^b^chasu^eb^ dvāresu dissanti.

378-9.^b^Kusalaṃ kāmalokasmiṃ^eb^ kāmalokamhi kusalaṃ pavatte, paṭisandhiyañca ^b^taṃtaṃpaccayamāgamma^eb^ taṃtaṃpaccayaṃ paṭicca. So so paccayo taṃtaṃpaccayo, ‘‘tatapaccayo’’ti vattabbe niggahītāgamavasena ‘‘taṃtaṃpaccayo’’ti vuttaṃ. Vicchākammadhārayasamāsoyaṃ. Vividhaṃ phalaṃ dadāti. Ekāya cetanāya ekā paṭisandhi bhagavatā pakāsitā. Nānākammehi nānā paṭisandhiyo ca bhavanti.

380-1.^b^Tihetukaṃ tu yaṃ kammaṃ^eb^ tihetukaṃ yaṃ kammaṃ pana kāmāvacarasaññitaṃ tihetukaṃ vipākaṃ duhetuñca vipākaṃ ahetuñca vipākaṃ deti. ^b^Duhetukaṃ tu yaṃ kammaṃ^eb^ duhetukaṃ yaṃ kammaṃ pana, taṃ kammaṃ tihetukaṃ vipākaṃ na deti, attano vipākaṃ duhetuñca ahetuñca deti.

382-3.^b^Tihetukena^eb^^a^V1.0062^ea^^b^kammena, paṭisandhi tihetukā^eb^ hoti, duhetukāpi paṭisandhi hoteva, ahetukā paṭisandhi neva hoti, ukkaṭṭhatihetukakammena tihetukā paṭisandhi, omakatihetukakammena duhetukā paṭisandhi hotīti adhippāyo. Duhetukena kammena duhetukā paṭisandhi, ahetukāpi paṭisandhi hoteva, tihetukā paṭisandhi neva hoti. Ukkaṭṭhaduhetukakammena duhetukā paṭisandhi, omakaduhetukakammena ahetukā paṭisandhi hotīti adhippāyo.
384. Asaṅkhārakammaṃ ^a^M0.0073^ea^ asaṅkhāravipākaṃ deti, sasaṅkhāravipākampi deti, sasaṅkhārakammaṃ sasaṅkhāraphalaṃ, tathā asaṅkhāraphalaṃ deti.
385.^b^Ekāya cetanāyettha ettha^eb^ etāsu cetanāsu ekāya kusalāya ^b^cetanāya^eb^ soḷasavidhā vipākacittāni bhavanti. ^b^Iti^eb^ vacanaṃ jino pakāsaye.

386-92. Vedanāparivattanaṃ ārammaṇena hoteva, tadārammaṇacittampi javanena niyāmitaṃ, somanassayutte kusale javane javite tadārammaṇampi somanassayuttameva hotīti attho. Upekkhāyuttakusalepi eseva nayo. Kāmāvacaracittena ^b^kusalenādinā^eb^ paṭhamena kusalena tulyena vipākacittena. Tatiyāvisesanaṃ. Yena sattena ^b^gahitā paṭisandhi ce^eb^ yadi, ^b^iṭṭhe balavārammaṇe^eb^ manāpe atimahantārammaṇe tassa sattassa ^b^cakkhussa^eb^ cakkhupasādassa ^b^āpāthaṃ^eb^ pākaṭabhāvaṃ ^b^āgate^eb^ sati manodhātuyā tāya bhavaṅgasmiṃ ^b^āvaṭṭite^eb^ bhavaṅgasote chindite sati cakkhuviññāṇakādīsu vīthicittesu jātesu paṭhamaṃ kusalaṃ kāmamānasaṃ javanaṃ hutvā jāyate. Sattakkhattuvārāni javitvāna paṭhame mahākusale gate ^b^tadeva^eb^ taṃ eva iṭṭhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā teneva paṭhamamahākusalena sadisaṃ tadārammaṇavipākacittaṃ. ^b^Sandhiyā tulyato^eb^ paṭisandhiyā tulyabhāvena ^b^mūlabhavaṅganti^eb^ mūlabhavaṅgaṃ nāma bhagavatā pavuccate. ^b^Tañca^eb^ tadārammaṇacittaṃ ^b^santīraṇaṃ^eb^ somanassayuttaṃ santīraṇaṃ dassanaṃ sampaṭicchanaṃ ^b^ettha^eb^ etasmiṃ vīthicitte ^b^gaṇanūpagacittāni^eb^ gaṇanaṃ upagatāni cittāni cattāri eva bhavanti.

393-4.^b^Yadā hi dutiyaṃ cittaṃ, kusalaṃ javanaṃ yadā^eb^ yasmiṃ kāle tasseva somanassatihetuno puggalassa dutiyaṃ ^a^M0.0074^ea^ kusalaṃ cittaṃ javanaṃ hoti, ^b^tadā^eb^ tasmiṃ kāle ^b^tena^eb^ javanena tulyavipākaṃ tadārammaṇaṃ. Tassa ^b^sandhiyā asamānattā^eb^ tassa tadārammaṇacittassa sandhiyā asamānattā ^a^V1.0063^ea^ dve nāmāni ^b^assa^eb^ vipākacittassa anena vipākacittena ^b^labbhare^eb^ labbhanti, ‘‘āgantukabhavaṅga’’nti nāmaṃ ‘‘tadārammaṇaka’’nti ca nāmaṃ iti dve nāmāni labbhanti.

395-6. Yadā tasseva puggalassa tatiyaṃ puññaṃ javanaṃ hoti, tadā ^b^tena^eb^ javanena sadisaṃ tatiyaṃ pākaṃ tadārammaṇikaṃ siyā. ^b^Idaṃ^eb^ vipākacittaṃ ^b^āgantukabhavaṅganti^eb^ āgantubhavaṅgaṃ nāma bhagavatā vuccate, purimāni ca ^b^pañca^eb^ vipākacittāni ^b^iminā pana^eb^ tatiyavipākena pana saddhiṃ ^b^cha^eb^ cittāni honti.

397-8.^b^Yadā catutthaṃ kusalaṃ^eb^ javanaṃ hoti, tadā ^b^tena^eb^ javanena tulyaṃ catutthavipākaṃ tadārammaṇabhāvaṃ ^b^vaje^eb^ gaccheyya. Catutthavipākaṃ āgantukabhavaṅgaṃ tadārammaṇanāmakaṃ hoti, purimāni cha pākāni ^b^iminā^eb^ saha catutthapākena ^b^satta^eb^ cittāni honti.

399-403.^b^Yadā^eb^ yasmiṃ kāle tasmiṃ cakkhudvāre iṭṭhamajjhattārammaṇaṃ pana tathā āpāthaṃ āgacchati ca, tadā vuttanayena āvajjanadassanasampaṭicchanacittesu jātesu ^b^idha^eb^ imasmiṃ majjhattārammaṇe ārammaṇavasena vedanā parivattati, tasmā upekkhāsahagataṃ santīraṇaṃ mano hoti. Upekkhāsahagatesu eva catūsupi javanesu javitesu ^b^tehi^eb^ javanehi tulyāni cattāri vipākacittāni jāyare. ^b^Accantaṃ^eb^ ekantena ^b^vedanāya^eb^ upekkhāvedanāya ^b^purimehi^eb^ somanassasahagatehi cittehi asamānattā cattāri cittāni nāmato piṭṭhibhavaṅgāni nāma honti, ^b^piṭṭhibhavaṅgāni^eb^ somanassavipākānaṃ pacchābhāge bhavaṅgānīti attho. Imāni ^a^M0.0075^ea^ upekkhāsahagatāni pañca vipākāni purimehi ^b^sattahi^eb^ vipākehi saddhiṃ dvādasa vipākāni bhavanti. ^b^Iti^eb^ vacanaṃ dhīro viniddise.

404-6. Yathā cakkhudvāre dvādasa vipākāni honti, tathā evaṃ sotādīsu dvāresupi dvādasa pākāni honti. ^b^Iti^eb^ vacanaṃ dhīro niddise, ime mayā vuttā vipākā samasaṭṭhi bhavanti. ^b^Evaṃ^eb^ iminā mayā vuttappakārena ekāya cetanāya kamme ^b^āyūhite^eb^ pavattite samasaṭṭhi vipākāni uppajjanti, imasmiṃ vacane saṃsayo natthi. ^b^Gahitāggahaṇenettha ettha^eb^ etesu vipākesu gahitānaṃ vipākānaṃ aggahaṇena cakkhudvāre dvādasa pākā, sotaviññāṇakādīni cattāri cāti soḷasa pākāni honti.

407-11. Ekena ^a^V1.0064^ea^ tihetukakusalena asaṅkhārikena kammena āyūhite yathā, ^b^evameva^eb^ sasaṅkhāratihetukakusalenāpi asaṅkhārasasaṅkhāraupekkhāsahagatehipi kusalehi kamme ^b^āyūhite^eb^ pavattite ^b^tesaṃ^eb^ tiṇṇaṃ kusalānaṃ vipākehi tīhipi dinnāya paṭisandhiyā eseva nayo paṇḍitena jānitabbo. ^b^Idha^eb^ imasmiṃ upekkhāsahagatadvaye iṭṭhamajjhattagocarassa vasena vipākacittappavattiṃ paṭhamaṃ dassetvā ^b^dassetabbātha pacchā tu, iṭṭhasmiṃ gocare idha atha pacchā^eb^ mayā vuttacittappavattito pacchākāle pana ^b^idha^eb^ imasmiṃ iṭṭhagocare ekekasmiṃ pana dvādasa dvādasa pākā paṇḍitena dassetabbā. ^b^Gahitāggahaṇenettha ettha^eb^ etesu vipākesu gahitānaṃ vipākānaṃ aggahaṇena soḷasa pākacittāni honti. ^b^Pubbe^eb^ kāle mayā vuttanayeneva ^b^sabbaṃ^eb^ vacanaṃ ^b^asesato^eb^ asesabhāvena paṇḍitena ñeyyaṃ.

412-4.^b^Tihetukena kammena, paṭisandhi tihetukā^eb^ bhavati, iti ayaṃ vāro ^b^ettāvatā^eb^ ettakena vacanena mayā ^a^M0.0076^ea^ vutto. Ekaṃ kammaṃ ekasmiṃ bhave ekaṃ paṭisandhiṃ janeti, ^b^tato^eb^ paṭisandhito ^b^aparaṃ^eb^ aññaṃ dutiyaṃ paṭisandhiṃ na janeti, pavattiyaṃ anekāni vipākāni sañjaneti. ^b^Hi^eb^ saccaṃ ‘‘ekaṃ kamma’’ntiādikaṃ vacanaṃ. ^b^Ekasmā bījā^eb^ ekato bījato ekaṃ aṅkuraṃ jāyati, ^b^assa^eb^ bījassa bahūni phalāni ^b^hetuppavattito^eb^ salilādihetuppattiyā honti.

415-21.^b^Duhetukena kammena, paṭisandhi duhetukā^eb^ hoti, ^b^iti^eb^ vacanaṃ ayaṃ vāro ^b^anupubbena^eb^ anupaṭipāṭiyā āgato. ^b^Idha^eb^ imasmiṃ adhikāre duhetukena puññena somanassayuttena asaṅkhārikena cittena kamme āyūhite pana duhetukena somanassayuttakusalena tulyena pākena yena sattena gahitā paṭisandhi ce, iṭṭhe ārammaṇe tassa sattassa cakkhudvāre āpāthaṃ āgate somanassayutte ñāṇahīne kusalamānase tasmiṃ duhetuke sattakkhattuṃ javitvāna gate taṃ eva ārammaṇaṃ katvā ^b^tadanantaraṃ^eb^ tassa javanassa anantaraṃ ^b^taṃsarikkhakaṃ^eb^ tena javanena sadisaṃ ekantaṃ asaṅkhārikamānasaṃ jāyati. ^b^Ta^eb^nti taṃ cittaṃ ^b^mūlabhavaṅganti^eb^ mūlabhavaṅgaṃ nāma ^b^tadārammaṇamiccapi^eb^ tadārammaṇaṃ nāma ubhayampi nāmaṃ ^b^tasseva nāmaṃ^eb^ tassa cittassa eva nāmaṃ. ^b^Iti^eb^ evaṃ iminā pakārena bhagavatā paridīpitaṃ. Duhetuke sasaṅkhāre kusale javane javitepi ca ^b^taṃsamaṃ^eb^ tena cittena sadisaṃ āgantukasaṅkhātaṃ tadārammaṇamānasaṃ hoti.

422-9.^b^Tatheva ca^eb^ tathā eva ca iṭṭhamajjhattagocare ^b^duhetūnaṃ^eb^ dvinnaṃ upekkhāyuttānaṃ javanānaṃ ^a^V1.0065^ea^ anantaraṃ ^b^tādisāni^eb^ tehi javanehi sadisāni dve tadārammaṇamānasāni jāyante, ^b^tesaṃ^eb^ tadārammaṇamānasānaṃ ‘‘piṭṭhibhavaṅga’’nti nāmaṃ, ‘‘āgantukabhavaṅga’’nti ca nāmaṃ hoti. Santīraṇadvayañceva dassanaṃ ^a^M0.0077^ea^ sampaṭicchanaṃ imāni dve bhavaṅgāni cāti ^b^aṭṭha^eb^ vipākā cakkhudvāre honti. ^b^Evaṃ^eb^ iminā mayā vuttappakārena pañcasu dvāresupi ca ^b^aṭṭha aṭṭha^eb^ vipāke katvā pavattiyaṃ cattālīsa vipākāni bhavanti. ^b^Gahitāggahaṇenettha, cakkhudvāre panaṭṭha ca ettha^eb^ etesu vipākesu gahitānaṃ vipākānaṃ aggahaṇena cakkhudvāre aṭṭha ca vipākā ^b^sotaghānādinā^eb^ vipākena saddhiṃ ^b^dvādasa eva^eb^ vipākāni bhavanti. ^b^Ekāya cetanāyevaṃ evaṃ^eb^ iminā mayā vuttappakārena ekāya cetanāya kamme ^b^āyūhite^eb^ pavattite pana sati dvādaseva vipākāni bhavanti. ^b^Iti^eb^ vacanaṃ vijitakusalayuddhasaṅgāmena ^b^pakāsitaṃ^eb^ desitaṃ. ^b^Duhetukattayenāpi, sesena sadisena tu^eb^ mayā vuttato duhetuto sesena duhetukattayenāpi sadisena pākena ^b^ādinnasandhino^eb^ gahitapaṭisandhikassa sattassa evaṃ nayo ^b^mato^eb^ kathito niraṅgaṇena. Duhetukena kammena duhetukā paṭisandhi hoti. Iti ayaṃ vāro ca ^b^ettāvatā^eb^ ettakena vacanena mayā vutto.

430-8.^b^Duhetukena kammena^eb^ ahetukā paṭisandhi hoti, iti ayaṃ vāro ^b^anupubbena^eb^ paṭipāṭiyā āgato. Tesu catūsupi duhetukesu kusalesu cittesu ^b^aññatareneva^eb^ hetukena kamme ^b^āyūhite^eb^ pavattite sati ^b^tasseva^eb^ duhetukassa kusalajavanassa pākabhūtāya upekkhāsahagatāhetukāya manoviññāṇadhātuyā ^b^ādinnapaṭisandhino^eb^ sattassa ^b^sā^eb^ paṭisandhi kammasadisā nāma na vattabbā paṇḍitehi. ^b^Hi^eb^ saccaṃ ‘‘paṭisandhi na vattabbā’’tiādikaṃ vacanaṃ. Kammaṃ duhetukaṃ hoti, paṭisandhi ahetukā hoti. ^b^Tassa^eb^ dehino sattassa ^b^vuḍḍhimupetassa^eb^ vuḍḍhiṃ upagatassa cakkhudvāre pana iṭṭhamajjhattagocare āpāthamāgate sati duhetukānaṃ catunnaṃ puññānaṃ yassa kassaci ^a^M0.0078^ea^ javanassa avasānamhi idaṃ ahetukaṃ mano tadārammaṇabhāvena jāyati. Ettha etasmiṃ vacane ^b^saṃsayo^eb^ sandeho natthi, ^b^taṃ^eb^ ahetukacittaṃ mūlabhavaṅgañca tadārammaṇameva ca hoti. Cakkhuviññāṇakādīsupi vīthicittesu jātesu upekkhāsahagataṃyeva santīraṇampi ca hoti. ^b^Tesu ekaṃ ṭhapetvāna, gahitāggahaṇenidha tesu^eb^ dvīsu santīraṇatadārammaṇakiccesu vipākesu ^b^ekaṃ^eb^ santīraṇakiccaṃ tadārammaṇakiccaṃ taṃ cittaṃ ṭhapetvā gahitānaṃ vipākānaṃ aggahaṇena idha iṭṭhamajjhattārammaṇe gaṇanūpagacittāni tīṇiyeva bhavanti.

439-41.^b^Iṭṭhe ārammaṇe cakkhu-dvāre āpāthamāgate^eb^ tadā santīraṇañceva somanassayuttaṃyeva ^a^V1.0066^ea^ hoti, tadārammaṇamānasañca somanassayuttaṃyeva hoti, ^b^tesu^eb^ santīraṇatadārammaṇakiccesu vipākesu ^b^ekekaṃ^eb^ santīraṇakiccaṃ, tadārammaṇakiccaṃ vā cittaṃ gahetvā purimāni ca tīṇi cattāri eva vipākāni bhavanti. ^b^Evaṃ^eb^ iminā mayā vuttappakārena pañcasu dvāresupi cattāri cattāri vipākacittānīti pavattiyaṃ vipākāni vīsati cittāni honti.

442-8.^b^Cakkhudvāre tu cattāri, gahitāggahaṇenidha^eb^ gahitānaṃ vipākānaṃ aggahaṇena cakkhudvāre pana cattāri vipākāni ^b^idha^eb^ imasmiṃ iṭṭhārammaṇe ^b^sotaghānādinā^eb^ vipākena saddhiṃ ahetukaṃ aṭṭhakaṃ hoti eva. Ahetukapaṭisandhissa sattassa duhetukaṃ, tihetukaṃ vā tadārammaṇaṃ ^b^na bhave^eb^ na bhaveyya, ^b^duhetupaṭisandhino^eb^ sattassa tihetukaṃ tadārammaṇaṃ na bhave. ^b^Jātā sugatiyaṃ yena, pākena paṭisandhi tu^eb^ sugatiyaṃ yena pākena paṭisandhi jātā, ^b^tena^eb^ vipākena tulyampi, hīnaṃ vā tesaṃ tadārammaṇaṃ bhaveyya. ^b^Manussalokaṃ sandhāya, vuttañcāhetukaṭṭhakaṃ^eb^ sugatiyaṃ ahetukaṭṭhakañca manussalokañca sandhāya paṭicca kāraṇaṃ ^a^M0.0079^ea^ katvā mayā vuttaṃ. Catūsupi ^b^apāyesu^eb^ pana apeto ayo patiṭṭhā etehīti apāyo, tesu. Pavatte ahetukaṃ aṭṭhakaṃ āpāyikehi labbhati. ^b^Thero nerayikānaṃ tu, dhammaṃ deseti vassati^eb^ thiro thirakāradhammo yasmiṃ atthīti thero, dutiyaaggasāvakabhūto iddhimā moggallānatthero ^b^nerayikānaṃ^eb^ niraye jātānaṃ sattānaṃ dhammaṃ deseti vassati, ‘‘ucchaṅge maṃ nisīditvā’’tiādīsu viya devaṃ vassāpetīti attho. Gandhaṃ vāyuñca māpeti yadā, tadā pana tesaṃ nerayikānaṃ sattānaṃ tehi nerayikasattehi theraṃ disvā, dhammañca sutvā, gandhañca ghāyitvā ^b^jalaṃ^eb^ udakañca ^b^pivataṃ^eb^ pivantānaṃ muduṃ vāyuñca tehi ^b^phusataṃ^eb^ phusantānaṃ tesaṃ nerayikasattānaṃ cakkhuviññāṇakādīni pañcapi ^b^puññajāni eva^eb^ kusalavipākāni eva santīraṇadvayaṃ ^b^puññajaṃ eva^eb^ kusalavipākaṃ eva puññajā eva ekā manodhātu iti aṭṭhakaṃ hoti.

449-50.^b^Ayaṃ tāva kathā^eb^ ‘‘cakkhuviññāṇakādīni puññajānevā’’tiādikā ayaṃ kathā iṭṭhaiṭṭhamajjhattagocare kāmāvacare puññānaṃ javanānaṃ vasena mayā vuttā. ^b^Tadārammaṇacetaso^eb^ tadārammaṇacittassa yaṃ niyamattaṃ ‘‘tadārammaṇamānasaṃ javanena niyāmita’’ntiādivacanena mayā vuttaṃ, ^b^taṃ^eb^ niyamattaṃ kusalaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Somanassayutte kāmāvacarakusale javite tadārammaṇampi somanassayuttameva hoti, upekkhāyutte kāmāvacarakusale javite tadārammaṇampi upekkhāyuttameva ^a^V1.0067^ea^ hoti, netaṃ akusale upekkhāyutte vicikicchādike akusale javane pana javite somanassayuttampi tadārammaṇaṃ hotīti adhippāyo. ^b^Itipi^eb^ vacanaṃ ācariyena dīpitaṃ.

451-7.^b^Idha^eb^ imasmiṃ adhippāye akusalacittesu somanassayuttesu catūsupi iṭṭhe ārammaṇe ^b^tesu^eb^ cittesu ^a^M0.0080^ea^ javitesu somanassayuttā ahetumanoviññāṇadhātu ^b^tadanantaraṃ^eb^ tesaṃ akusalajavanānaṃ anantaraṃ tadārammaṇabhāvena jāyati. Upekkhāyuttesu chasu akusalacittesu iṭṭhamajjhatte gocare javitesu puññajā upekkhāsahagatā ahetumanoviññāṇadhātu eva ^b^tadanantaraṃ^eb^ vā tesaṃ upekkhāsahagatānaṃ channaṃ akusalajavanānaṃ anantaraṃ tadārammaṇabhāvena jāyati. ^b^Iṭṭhārammaṇayogasmiṃ^eb^ buddharūpādiiṭṭhārammaṇayogasmiṃ ^b^kaṅkhato^eb^ ‘‘buddho nu kho, no buddho’’ti kaṅkhantassa sattassa ^b^uddhatassa^eb^ vā sattassa tadārammaṇamānasaṃ somanassayuttaṃ ahetukaṃ vipākaṃ hoti piṭṭhibhavaṅgaṃ. ^b^Somanassayute citte, javane javite pana^eb^ somanassayuttā eva pañca tadārammaṇamānasā paṇḍitena gavesitabbā. Upekkhāsahagate citte javane pana javite sati upekkhāsahagatā cha ca tadārammaṇamānasā paṇḍitena gavesitabbā.

458-63.^b^Tihetusomanassena, ādinnapaṭisandhino^eb^ sattassa jhānato parihīnassa vippaṭisārino taṃ jhānaṃ ^b^paccavekkhato^eb^ paccavekkhantassa domanassayuttaṃ cittaṃ hoti. ^b^Tassa^eb^ domanassassa anantaraṃ kiṃ mānasaṃ jāyate, tvaṃ domanassayuttajavanassa anantaramānasaṃ ^b^brūhi^eb^ kathehi. ^b^Paṭṭhāne paṭisiddhā hi^eb^ domanassassānantaraṃ somanassassa uppatti ^b^paṭṭhāne paṭisiddhā^eb^ paṭṭhānappakaraṇe bhagavatā nivāritā, ^b^assa^eb^ somanassassa vā anantaraṃ domanassassa uppatti paṭṭhāne paṭṭhānappakaraṇe paṭisiddhā bhagavatā nivāritā. ^b^Mahaggataṃ panārabbha^eb^ mahaggataṃ paṭicca javane javitepi ca tadārammaṇamānasaṃ ^b^tattheva^eb^ tasmiṃ paṭṭhāne eva ^b^paṭisiddhaṃ^eb^ bhagavatā nivāritaṃ. ^b^Tasmā^eb^ kāraṇā bhavaṅgapāto vā tadārammaṇameva vā na hoti. ^b^Kiṃ nu kātabbaṃ^eb^ tesaṃ bhavaṅgatadārammaṇānaṃ abhāve kāraṇaṃ yaṃ kātabbaṃ, amhehi taṃ ^a^M0.0081^ea^ kāraṇaṃ kiṃ nu pucchāma, taṃ tadatthaṃ ābhidhammikabhāvena ābhidhammika taṃ kāraṇaṃ ^b^vada^eb^ vadāhi. Upekkhāsahagatāhetumanoviññāṇadhātu puññāpuññavipākā tadārammaṇikā ^b^siyā^eb^ bhaveyya.

464-7.^b^Imassa^eb^ tadārammaṇassa āvajjanaṃ kiṃ natthi? ^b^Taṃ^eb^ tadārammaṇamānasaṃ ^b^kathaṃ^eb^ kena pakārena jāyate? ^b^Bhavaṅgaāvajjanānaṃ^eb^ cittānaṃ kiṃ āvajjanamattaṃ? Maggassa anantarassa ca phalassāpi kiṃ āvajjanaṃ natthi? ^b^Nirodhā ca^eb^ nirodhato vuṭṭhahantassa bhikkhuno phalacittassa vāti ^a^V1.0068^ea^ mayā sutaṃ, ^b^evaṃ^eb^ iminā mayā vuttappakārena āvajjanaṃ natthi. ^b^Vinā āvajjanenāpi, hotu jāyatu mānasaṃ^eb^ cittaṃ āvajjanena vinā āvajjanaṃ vajjetvā hotu jāyatu, ^b^kimassārammaṇaṃ^eb^ assa tadārammaṇamānasassa kiṃ ārammaṇaṃ, paṇḍita, tvaṃ ārammaṇaṃ yadi jānāsi, taṃ ārammaṇaṃ ^b^brūhi^eb^ mayhaṃ kathehi. ^b^Vinā ārammaṇenetaṃ etaṃ^eb^ mānasaṃ ^b^ārammaṇena vinā^eb^ ārammaṇaṃ vajjetvā na jāyati. ^b^Hi^eb^ saccaṃ ‘‘vinā ārammaṇeneta’’ntiādikaṃ vacanaṃ, tadārammaṇamānasaṃ yadā domanassayuttaṃ javanaṃ mahaggatārammaṇaṃ javati, tadā tasmiṃyeva javanacittakkhaṇe ^b^parittesu^eb^ kāmāvacarārammaṇesu ^b^yaṃ kiñci^eb^ parittārammaṇaṃ ^b^ārabbha^eb^ paṭicca jāyati.

468-73.^b^Utubījaniyāmo ca^eb^ utuniyāmo bījaniyāmo ca ^b^kammadhammaniyāmatā ca^eb^ kammaniyāmatā ca sīlādipāramīdhammaniyāmatā ca cittassa niyāmo cāti pañca niyāmatā paṇḍitena ñeyyā. ^b^Tattha^eb^ tesu pañcasu niyāmesu sabbesaṃ pana rukkhānaṃ ekappahārena phalapupphādidhāraṇaṃ utu, ayaṃ utuniyāmatā. ^b^Tesaṃ tesaṃ tu bījānaṃ, taṃtaṃtulyaphalubbhavo^eb^ tesaṃ tesaṃ bījānaṃ pana tehi tehi bījehi tulyānampi sassānaṃ phalānaṃ uppatti, ayaṃ bījaniyāmatā ^a^M0.0082^ea^. ^b^Matthake nāḷikerassa^eb^ nāḷikeraphalassa matthake ^b^chiddattaṃ^eb^ chiddabhāvo, ayaṃ ^b^bījajo^eb^ bījato jāto niyāmo. Tihetukakammaṃ tihetukañca vipākaṃ duhetukañca vipākaṃ ahetukañca vipākaṃ yato yaṃ kammaṃ deti, ayaṃ kammaniyāmatā. ^b^Bodhisattassa jātiyaṃ^eb^ jinaṅkurassa jātikkhaṇe medanīkampanādikaṃ anekavisesattaṃ, ayaṃ sīlādipāramīdhammaniyāmatā. Tena gocarena pasādasmiṃ ghaṭṭite sati ^b^idha^eb^ imasmiṃ cittavīthiyaṃ ^b^āvajjanādīnaṃ^eb^ cittānaṃ uppatti, ayaṃ cittaniyāmatā.

474. Yo puggalo ^b^dhīro^eb^ dhīrasampanno guṇasampanno vikkhittapāpo ^b^mohandhakārāpagamaṃ^eb^ andhakāramanissāya avijjānissaraṇaṃ ^b^yadicche^eb^ sace iccheyya, so dhīro ^b^imaṃ^eb^ abhidhammāvatārappakaraṇaṃ ^b^andhajjanānaṃ^eb^ andhasadisabālajanānaṃ ^b^hadayandhakāraṃ viddhaṃsanaṃ^eb^ andhakārasannissitassa yassa hadayassa viddhaṃsanakaraṃ ^b^jalantaṃ dīpaṃ^eb^ jalamānaṃ dīpaṃ. ^b^Payatto^eb^ti pakārena yatati vīriyaṃ karotīti payatto, ^b^satataṃ^eb^ sabbadā ^b^sikkhetha^eb^ sajjhāyanadhāraṇacintanavasena sikkheyya.
Iti abhidhammāvatāraṭīkāya
Vipākacittappavattiniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
Sattamo paricchedo.
^b^Idāni^eb^^a^V1.0069^ea^^b^pana sabbesaṃ, etesaṃ mānasaṃ mayā;^eb^
^b^Pāṭavatthāya bhikkhūnaṃ, kathīyati pakiṇṇakaṃ.^eb^

^b^Idāni^eb^ pana kāle ^b^etesaṃ^eb^ tihetukadvihetukaahetukānaṃ ^b^sabbesaṃ^eb^ puggalānaṃ pakiṇṇakaṃ mānasaṃ ^b^bhikkhūnaṃ^eb^^b^pāṭavatthāya^eb^^a^M0.0083^ea^ bhikkhūnaṃ chekabhāvatthāya mayā kathīyate uccate.

476-85.^b^Panthamakkaṭako^eb^ uṇṇanābhi panthamakkaṭako nāma pañcasu disāsu tassa suttaṃ pasāretvā jālamajjhe nipajjati. ^b^Paṭhamāya disāyettha ettha^eb^ etāsu disāsu paṭhamāya disāya pasārite sutte pāṇakena paṭaṅgena vā makkhikāya vā ghaṭṭite sati sā uṇṇanābhi kiñci ^b^calitvā^eb^ phandanaṃ katvā nipannaṭṭhānato ^b^suttānusārena^eb^ suttaṃ anusāretvā tassa pāṇakassa ^b^yūsaṃ^eb^ yūsasaṅkhātaṃ soṇitaṃ pivati. Punāgantvā ^b^tattheva^eb^ tasmiṃ jālamajjheyeva yathāsukhaṃ nipajjati, yathā paṭhamāya disāya calanādikaṃ kiriyaṃ karoti, evameva dutiyādīsu catūsu disāsu calanādikaṃ kiriyaṃ karoti, evaṃ pañcasu disāsu suttaṃ viya pañca pasādā paṇḍitena daṭṭhabbā, majjhe makkaṭako viya ca cittaṃ pana paṇḍitena daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Pāṇakādīhi^eb^ khuddakatiracchānehi tassa saṅghaṭṭanā viya ārammaṇe pana pasādānaṃ saṅghaṭṭanā paṇḍitena daṭṭhabbā. Jālamajjhe nipannāya uṇṇanābhiyā taṃ calanaṃ viya pasāde ghaṭṭetīti ^b^pasādaghaṭṭanaṃ,^eb^ kiṃ taṃ? Ārammaṇaṃ. ^b^Tattha^eb^ tissaṃ vīthiyaṃ pasādaghaṭṭanaṃ ārammaṇaṃ gahetvā manodhātukiriyācittaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ āvaṭṭetīti ^b^bhavaṅgāvaṭṭanaṃ^eb^ mataṃ bhagavatā. ^b^Tassa^eb^ panthamakkaṭakassa ^b^suttānusāraṃva^eb^ suttaṃ anugamanaṃ viya vīthicittappavattanaṃ paṇḍitena daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sīse pana vijjhitvā ^b^assa^eb^ makkaṭassa yūsapānaṃ viya javanassa cittassa ārammaṇesu pavattanaṃ paṇḍitena daṭṭhabbaṃ. Puna āgantvā suttajālamajjhe nipajjanaṃ yathā ^b^vatthuṃyeva^eb^ hadayavatthuṃ eva nissāya cittassa parivattanaṃ paṇḍitena daṭṭhabbaṃ.

486-93.^b^Idaṃ^eb^^a^V1.0070^ea^^b^tu pana opammaṃ, atthaṃ dīpeti kiṃ tu hi^eb^ idaṃ opammaṃ kaṃ atthaṃ ^b^dīpeti^eb^ pakāseti? Paṭhamaṃ pasāde ārammaṇena ^a^M0.0084^ea^ ghaṭṭite sati ^b^pasādavatthuto^eb^ pasādo vatthu nissayo etassāti pasādavatthu, cittaṃ, tato pasādavatthuto, paṭhamaṃ eva vatthusannissitaṃ bhavaṅgasaṅkhātaṃ ^b^mano^eb^ jāyati, itipi attho tena opammena dīpito. Ekekārammaṇaṃ dvīsu dvīsu dvāresu ^b^sabbaso^eb^ sabbappakārena pana āpāthaṃ āgacchati, ayamatthopi ^b^tena^eb^ opammena dīpito ‘‘dvīsu dvīsu dvāresū’’ti, ekaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ ekasmiṃyeva khaṇe cakkhudvāre, manodvāre cāti dvīsu dvāresu āpāthaṃ āgacchatīti attho. Sotadvārādīsupi eseva nayo ñeyyo. Rūpaṃ cakkhupasādamhi ghaṭṭetvā ^b^taṅkhaṇe pana^eb^ tassa khaṇe pana tathā manodvāre pana āpāthaṃ āgacchati, bhavaṅgacalanassa paccayo hotīti attho. ^b^Na saṃsayo^eb^ etasmiṃ vacane saṃsayo natthi. ^b^Yathā khago^eb^ yathā sakuṇo. ^b^Hi^eb^ saccaṃ mayā vuttaṃ vacanaṃ. ^b^Rukkhagge^eb^ rukkhakoṭiyaṃ nilīyantova sākhino sākhaṃ ghaṭṭeti, tassa chāyā ^b^bhūmiyaṃ^eb^ pathaviyaṃ ^b^pharati^eb^ paṭihaññati. ^b^Idhā^eb^ti nipāto. Sākhāya sakuṇena ghaṭṭanaṃ bhūmiyaṃ chāyāpharaṇāpi ca apubbaṃ acarimaṃ ekakkhaṇasmiṃyeva ^b^jāyare^eb^ jāyanti. Evameva pana rūpassa, pasādassa ca ghaṭṭanaṃ, tatheva ^b^atthato^eb^ atthavasena bhavaṅgacalanassāpi ^b^paccayattena^eb^ paccayabhāvena manodvāre āpāthaṃ āgamanaṃ apubbaṃ acarimaṃ ekakkhaṇeyeva hoti.

494-7. Tato paraṃ bhavaṅgasotaṃ chinditvā ^b^cakkhudvāre^eb^ cakkhupasāde yathākkamaṃ āvajjane samuppanne, dassane samuppanne, sampaṭicchane samuppanne, santīraṇe samuppanne, tathā voṭṭhabbane ca samuppanne kusalaṃ javanacittaṃ javati, tathā akusalameva cittaṃ javati. Sotadvārādīsupi saddādīnaṃ ārammaṇānaṃ ghaṭṭane eseva nayo avisesena viññunā viññeyyo. Etassa atthassa dīpane ^b^dovārikopamādīni^eb^ vacanāni ^a^M0.0085^ea^^b^uddharitvā^eb^ tato pakaraṇato nīharitvā ^b^ettha^eb^ etasmiṃ vīthiyādhikāre viññunā dassetabbāni.

498-9.^b^Asambhedena cakkhussā^eb^ti tassāpi cakkhu asambhinnaṃ hoti. Jīvitā niruddhampi pittena vā semhena vā ruhirena vā palibuddhaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa paccayo bhavituṃ asakkontaṃ sambhinnaṃ nāma, sakkontaṃ asambhinnaṃ nāma hoti. Tena cakkhupasādassa asambhinnena rūpāpāthagamanena ālokasannissayenāpi. Tena tividhena paccayena ^b^samanakkārahetunā^eb^ pañcadvārāvajjanapaccayena saha pavattanena. Etehi pana catūhi paccayehi saṃ ekato inti pavattantīti ^a^V1.0071^ea^ sametā, ^b^sametehi^eb^ sahagatehi samāgamaṃ ekībhāvaṃ āgatehi, taṃ ^b^cakkhuviññāṇaṃ^eb^ cakkhupasādanissitaṃ viññāṇaṃ sampayuttehi cetasikehi saha jāyate.

500-1.^b^Asambhedena sotassa^eb^ sotapasādassa asambhinnena ^b^saddāpāthagamena ca^eb^ saddassa āpāthagamanena ca. Ākāsanissayenāpi pihitakaṇṇacchiddassa sotaviññāṇaṃ nuppajjati. Tena tividhena paccayena. ^b^Samanakkārahetunā^eb^ pañcadvārāvajjanapaccayena saha pavattena. Etehi pana catūhi paccayehi ^b^sametehi^eb^ sahagatehi samāgamaṃ ekībhāvaṃ āgatehi taṃ sotaviññāṇaṃ sampayuttehi saha jāyati.

502-3.^b^Asambhedena^eb^ ghānassa ghānapasādassa asambhinnena ^b^gandhāpāthagamena ca^eb^ gandhassa āpāthagamanena ca. ^b^Vāyosannissayenāpī^eb^ti ghānabilamhi pavisantena vāyunāti attho. Tena tividhena paccayena. ^b^Samanakkārahetunā^eb^ pañcadvārāvajjanapaccayena saha pavattena. Etehi pana catūhi paccayehi ^b^sametehi^eb^ sahagatehi samāgamaṃ ekībhāvaṃ ^a^M0.0086^ea^ āgatehi taṃ ghānaviññāṇaṃ sampayuttehi saha jāyati.

504-5.^b^Asambhedena jivhāya^eb^ jivhāya asambhinnena ^b^rasāpāthagamena ca^eb^ rasassa āpāthagamanena ca. ^b^Āposannissayenāpī^eb^ti jivhātemanaṃ āpaṃ laddhā ca uppajjati, tena vinā sukkhakhādanīye jivhāya sāyitepi jivhāviññāṇaṃ nuppajjatīti attho. Tena tividhena paccayena. ^b^Samanakkārahetunā^eb^ pañcadvārāvajjanapaccayena saha pavattena. Etehi pana catūhi paccayehi ^b^sametehi^eb^ sahagatehi samāgamaṃ ekībhāvaṃ āgatehi taṃ jivhāviññāṇaṃ sampayuttehi saha jāyati.

506-7. Kāyapasādassa asambhedena phoṭṭhabbassa āpāthagamanena ca. ^b^Pathavīnissayenāpī^eb^ti tena vinā kāyadvārampīti bahiddhā mahābhūtārammaṇaṃ ajjhattikaṃ kāyapasādaṃ ghaṭṭetvā pasādapaccayesu mahābhūtesu paṭihaññati. Tena tividhena paccayena. ^b^Samanakkārahetunā^eb^ pañcadvārāvajjanapaccayena saha pavattena. Etehi pana catūhi paccayehi ^b^sametehi^eb^ sahagatehi samāgamaṃ ekībhāvaṃ āgatehi taṃ kāyaviññāṇaṃ sampayuttehi saha jāyati.

508-9.^b^Asambhedā^eb^^a^V1.0072^ea^^b^manassāpī^eb^ti ^b^mana^eb^nti bhavaṅgacittaṃ. Taṃ niruddhampi āvajjanacittassa paccayo bhavituṃ asamatthaṃ mandatamagatameva vattamānampi sambhinnaṃ nāma hoti. Āvajjanassa paccayo bhavituṃ samatthaṃ asambhinnaṃ nāma. Manassa asambhedena dhammassa āpāthagamanena ca ^b^vatthusannissayena^eb^ hadayavatthusannissayena. Tena tividhena paccayena. ^b^Samanakkārahetunā^eb^ manodvārāvajjanena saha pavattena. Etehi pana catūhi paccayehi ^b^sametehi^eb^ sahagatehi samāgamaṃ ^a^M0.0087^ea^ ekībhāvaṃ āgatehi ^b^taṃ manoviññāṇaṃ^eb^ taṃ manoviññāṇasaṅkhātaṃ javanacittaṃ sampayuttehi saha jāyate.

510-11. Mano bhavaṅgacittaṃ nāma vibhāvinā veditabbaṃ. ^b^Āvajjanakriyācittaṃ^eb^ āvajjanakiriyācittadvayaṃ samanakkāro nāma vibhāvinā saññitaṃ. Vatthusannissayena iti ^b^ayaṃ^eb^ pāṭho ^b^sabbattha^eb^ sabbesu bhavesu na gacchati. Pañcahi khandhehi vokāro vokiṇṇoti ^b^pañcavokāro,^eb^ pañcavokārabhavaṃ ^b^sandhāya^eb^ kāraṇaṃ katvā ‘‘vatthusannissayenā’’ti ayaṃ pāṭho pana kathito mayā, pañcavokārabhavo nāma kāmarūpabhavo, arūpabhavo catuvokārabhavo nāma, asaññībhavo ekavokārabhavo nāma. Ayaṃ pāṭho catuvokāraarūpabhavaṃ sandhāya na kathitoti attho. Vatthussa rūpattā arūpabhave kathaṃ vatthusannissayo bhaveyyāti attho.

512-4.^b^Paṭisandhādicittāni, sabbānekūnavīsati^eb^ honti, kāmāvacaresu dasa, rūpesu pañca, arūpīsu cattāri, sabbāni paṭisandhicittāni ekūnavīsati honti. ^b^Kammaṃ^eb^ nāma kusalākusalacetanā. ^b^Kammanimittaṃ^eb^ nāma rūpāni pañcārammaṇāni paññatti ca mahaggatacittañca. Tathā ^b^gatinimittakaṃ^eb^ nāma kapparukkhādayo, akusalapakkhe rūpādiārammaṇabhūtā lohakumbhādayo ca. Iti evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena ^b^tesaṃ^eb^ paṭisandhādicittānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ tividhaṃ bhagavatā udīritaṃ. ^b^Kāmāvacarasandhīnaṃ parittārammaṇaṃ^eb^ kāmāvacarārammaṇaṃ bhagavatā mataṃ. ^b^Paccuppannaṃ^eb^ rūpādipañcārammaṇaṃ, gatinimittaṃ pañcārammaṇañca paccuppannañca hoti. ^b^Atītaṃ vā^eb^ kammaṃ kusalākusalacetanā atītāyeva, na paccuppannā. ^b^Anāgataṃ^eb^ ārammaṇaṃ natthi.

515-26. Aṭṭheva ca mahāvipākā, tīṇi santīraṇāni cāti ekādasavidhaṃ cittaṃ tadārammaṇasaññitaṃ. Ekādasavidhe citte ^a^M0.0088^ea^ tadārammaṇasaññite ^b^puññavipākāni^eb^ kusalavipākā dasa ^a^V1.0073^ea^ honti, ^b^apuññajaṃ^eb^ akusalavipākaṃ pana ekaṃ hoti. Mahāvipākā rūpārūpabhavadvaye na jāyanti, kāmarūpabhave santīraṇattayaṃ hoti. Yāni tadārammaṇacittāni ^b^satthunā^eb^ jinena vuttāni, ^b^tesu^eb^ tadārammaṇacittesu ^b^ekampi^eb^ tadārammaṇacittaṃ rūpārūpabhavadvaye tadārammaṇaṃ hutvā kadācipi nappavattati. ^b^Kasmā^eb^ kāraṇā? ^b^Tattha^eb^ tasmiṃ rūpārūpabhavadvaye ‘‘tadārammaṇaṃ na hotī’’ti vacanaṃ codako bhaveyya, bījassābhāvato pana na hotīti parihāro. Akāmāvacarārammaṇe ^b^akāmāvacaradhamme^eb^ idaṃ tadārammaṇamānasaṃ neva anubandhati. ^b^Hi^eb^ kasmā kāraṇā? ^b^Parittārammaṇattā ca ekantena^eb^ avassaṃ tadārammaṇamānasassa kāmāvacarārammaṇattā ca tathā aparicitattā ca sabbadā nānubandhati. Tañhi yathā pitaraṃ vā pitusadisaṃ vā ñātiṃ anubandhantopi taruṇadārako gharadvārantaravīthicatukkādimhi pariciteyeva dese anubandhati, na araññaṃ vā yuddhabhūmiṃ vā gacchati, evaṃ kāmāvacare dhamme anubandhantampi mahaggatalokuttaradhammamārabbha pavattamāne dhamme nānubandhati. Yasmā cassa sabbo kāmāvacarapāko ca kiriyāmanodhātu kiriyāahetukamanoviññāṇadhātu somanassasahagatā ime dhammā parittārammaṇāti evaṃ accantaṃ parittameva ārammaṇaṃ vuttaṃ, tasmā cetaṃ mahaggatalokuttarārammaṇe kāmāvacaradhammepi nānubandhatīti veditabbaṃ.

527-32.^b^Kiṃ tena yuttivādena, vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāsu hi^eb^ ‘‘janakaṃ tena tulya’’ntiādikena tena, yuttiyā vādo yuttivādo, ‘‘janakaṃ tena tulya’’ntiādikāya yuttikathāya kiṃ payojanaṃ vuttaṃ? Aṭṭhakathāsu hi saccaṃ ‘‘kiṃ tena yuttivādenā’’ti vacanaṃ, ‘‘atthakathāsū’’ti vattabbe samāse hi ttha-ssa ṭṭha-kāraṃ katvā ‘‘aṭṭhakathāsū’’ti vuttaṃ ^a^M0.0089^ea^. Kāmāvacare dhamme paṭicca tadārammaṇabhāvadīpakaṃ vacanaṃ ācariyena vuttaṃ. ^b^Tadārammaṇacittāni, ekādasapi sabbaso^eb^ sabbappakārenapi tadārammaṇacittāni ^b^nāmagottaṃ panārabbha^eb^ tissādikaṃ nāmapaññattiṃ paṭicca kaccāyanagottakassapagottādikaṃ gottapaññattiṃ paṭicca javane javitepi ca tadārammaṇaṃ na gaṇhanti, rūpārūpabhavesu vā tadārammaṇaṃ na gaṇhanti. ^b^Yadā paññattimārabbha, javane javitepi vā^eb^ yadā mayā vuttāya paññattiyā sesapaññattiṃ paṭicca javane javitepi vā tadārammaṇaṃ na labbhate ācariyena, tathā dukkhaaniccaanattalakkhaṇārammaṇikāya vipassanāya tadārammaṇaṃ na labbhate ācariyena. ^b^Tadārammaṇā na labbhanti, micchattaniyatesupi^eb^ micchatte micchāsabhāve ‘‘natthi dinna’’ntyādivasena niyatāni cattāri diṭṭhiyuttajavanāni micchattaniyatāni, micchattaniyatesupi tadārammaṇaṃ na labbhate ācariyena, lokuttaradhamme ārabbha ^a^V1.0074^ea^ javane gatepi tadārammaṇaṃ na labbhate ācariyena. Tathā mahaggate dhamme ārabbha javane javitepi tadārammaṇaṃ na labbhate ācariyena, paṭisambhidāñāṇaṃ ārabbha javane javitepi tadārammaṇaṃ na labbhate ācariyena. Manodvārepi sabbesaṃ javanānaṃ anantaraṃ anupubbato tadārammaṇacittāni bhavanti.

533-4. Manodvāre ārammaṇaghaṭṭanā na vijjati. Bhavaṅgato ^b^cetaso^eb^ vīthicittassa vuṭṭhānaṃ ^b^kathaṃ^eb^ kena pakārena hoti? Manodvārepi ^b^ghaṭṭanāya vinā^eb^ ghaṭṭanaṃ vajjetvā āpāthaṃ āgacchanteva yasmā kāraṇā, ^b^tasmā^eb^ vīthicittānaṃ sambhavo hoti.

535-6.^b^Dvādasāpuññacittānaṃ^eb^ dvādasaakusalacittānaṃ vipākā sattasattati ^b^pāpapākā^eb^ dvādasapāpacittānaṃ vipākā ^a^M0.0090^ea^ caturāsīti pavattiyaṃ honti. Ekassa somanassayuttadiṭṭhisampayuttākusalassa cakkhusotaghānajivhākāyaviññāṇāni, sampaṭicchanaṃ, upekkhāyuttasantīraṇāni cāti satta akusalapākā honti. Tathā sesānaṃ ekādasannaṃ akusalānampi satta vipākā honti. ^b^Ekādasavidhānaṃ tu, hitvā uddhaccamānasaṃ^eb^ uddhaccamānasaṃ hitvā ekādasavidhānaṃ paṭisandhiyo ekādasavidhā ceva bhavanti.

537-8.^b^Kriyacittesu sabbesu yaṃ^eb^ āvajjanadvayaṃ javanaṃ na ca hoti, ^b^taṃ^eb^ āvajjanadvayaṃ ^b^karaṇamattattā^eb^ kiriyāmattattā ^b^vātapupphasamaṃ^eb^ vātapupphena sadisaṃ mataṃ bhagavatā. Ayametthādhippāyo – khīṇāsave uppannakāle vā taṃ āvajjanadvayaṃ kiriyacittaṃ bhavituṃ yuttaṃ. Sabbesu puthujjanesu uppannakāle kathaṃ kiriyā hotīti ce? Karaṇamattattā aphaladāyakaṃ vātapupphaṃ viya aphaladāyakaṃ kiriyacittaṃ bhavituṃ yuttihāro kiriyā pana hoti. Yaṃ sabbaṃ kiriyacittaṃ ^b^kiccasādhanato^eb^ javanakiccasādhanavasena ^b^javanattaṃ^eb^ javanabhāvaṃ pattaṃ chinnamūlassa rukkhassa pupphaṃ aphalaṃ hoti yathā, evaṃ chinnāvijjātaṇhāmūlassa vītarāgassa taṃ sabbaṃ kiriyacittaṃ ^b^aphalaṃ^eb^ vipākavirahitaṃ ^b^siyā^eb^ bhaveyya.

539-40.^b^Paṭicca pana etasmā, phalametīti paccayo^eb^ ekaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ^b^etasmā^eb^ dhammato phalaṃ ^b^eti^eb^ pavattati tasmā paccayo, yo dhammo yassa dhammassa ṭhitiyā uppattiyāpi upakāro ^a^V1.0075^ea^ nāma hoti, ^b^so^eb^ dhammo ^b^tassa^eb^ dhammassa ^b^paccayoti^eb^ paccayo nāma paṇḍitena pavuccate. Sambhavo pabhavo hetu kāraṇaṃ paccayo mato bhagavatā. Idaṃ vacanaṃ aññattha dīpanavacanaṃ.

541.^b^Lobhādi pana yo dhammo, mūlaṭṭhenupakārako^eb^ yo lobhādi pana dhammo mūlabhāvena phaladhammassa ^a^M0.0091^ea^ upakārako, so lobhādidhammo phaladhammassa ^b^hetūti^eb^ hetu nāma vibhāvinā viññātabbo.
542.^b^Lobho doso ca moho ca^eb^ tathā alobhādayo tayo hetū, te cha eva hetuyo honti, ^b^jātito^eb^ jātivasena kusalajātiakusalajātiabyākatajātivasena ^b^navadhā^eb^ navahi koṭṭhāsehi siyuṃ.

543-4.^b^Dhammānaṃ kusalādīnaṃ, kusalādittasādhako^eb^ yo dhammo kusalādīnaṃ dhammānaṃ kusalādittasādhako kusalādibhāvasādhako, so dhammo mūlaṭṭho nāma. ^b^Evaṃ^eb^ vacanaṃ ^b^eke^eb^ ekacce ācariyā vadanti. ^b^Evaṃ sante^eb^ kusalākusalādīnaṃ dhammānaṃ kusalādittasādhakavasena mūlaṭṭhe sante ^b^taṃsamuṭṭhānarūpīsu^eb^ tehi cittehi samuṭṭhānarūpesu tehi cittehi samuṭṭhitesu cittajarūpesu ^b^hetūnaṃ^eb^ lobhādihetūnaṃ hetupaccayatā kadācipi neva sampajjati. Ayametthādhippāyo – yadi cittesu rūpāni samuṭṭhāpentesu te lobhādayopi cittānaṃ sampayuttacittānaṃ ekuppādattā ca rūpāni samuṭṭhāpentiyeva. Tadā tesaṃ mate tesaṃ cittajarūpānaṃ kusalādittaṃ siyā. Na ca kadāci rūpāni kusalādināmakāni dissanti yasmā, tasmā cittajarūpānaṃ kusalādibhāvañāpanatthaṃ tesaṃ cittajarūpānaṃ te lobhādayo hetupaccayā na honti, iti vacanaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā. Evañca sati cittajarūpāni nāma kadācipi viyuttāni caranti, tasmā kusalādittasādhako mūlaṭṭho na hoti.

545-6.^b^Hi^eb^ saccaṃ ‘‘evaṃ sante tu hetūna’’ntiādikaṃ vacanaṃ. ^b^Te^eb^ lobhādayo hetū tesaṃ rūpānaṃ ^b^kusalāditaṃ^eb^ kusalādibhāvaṃ ^b^na sādhenti^eb^ na nipphādenti. ^b^Te^eb^ hetū tesaṃ ^a^M0.0092^ea^ pana rūpānaṃ paccayā ^b^na ca^eb^ na hontiyeva, ^b^tasmā^eb^ kāraṇā kusalādīnaṃ dhammānaṃ kusalādittasādhako yo dhammo, so dhammo ^b^mūlaṭṭhoti^eb^ mūlasabhāvo nāma ^b^samayaññunā^eb^ samayavijānanasīlena viññunā ^b^gantabbo^eb^ jānitabbo.

547.^b^Suppatiṭṭhitabhāvassa^eb^^a^V1.0076^ea^, ^b^sādhanenupakārako^eb^ suppatiṭṭhitabhāvaṃ sādhanena upakārako yo attho, so attho ^b^hetūnaṃ^eb^ lobhādīnaṃ ^b^mūlaṭṭho^eb^ mūlasabhāvo ^b^iti ca^eb^ gahaṇaṃ vibhāvinā viññātabbaṃ.

548-9.^b^Kusalākusalā hetū^eb^ kusalā hetū, akusalā hetū, ^b^kriyāhetū sabbaso^eb^ sabbappakārena sabbe kiriyāhetuyo ca sampayuttānaṃ pañcavokārabhūmiyaṃ sampayuttānaṃ dhammānaṃ aññamaññapaccayabhāvena hetupaccayataṃ ^b^yātā^eb^ gatā. Taṃsamuṭṭhānānaṃ cittajarūpānañca hetupaccayataṃ ^b^yātā^eb^ gatā, ete hetū catuvokārabhūmiyaṃ sampayuttānaṃ eva dhammānaṃ hetupaccayataṃ ^b^yātā^eb^ gatā.

550-1. Kāme vipākahetūpi attanā sampayuttānaṃ hetupaccayataṃ yātā, paṭisandhikkhaṇepi ^b^kaṭattārūpajātānaṃ^eb^ kammajarūpānaṃ hetupaccayataṃ yātā, tasmā paṭisandhicittuppādakkhaṇeyeva kammajarūpānaṃ uppādo hoti, yasmā kāraṇā pavattiyaṃ cittajānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayataṃ gatā.

552-5. Rūpe vipākahetū kāmāvacarabhūmiyaṃ hetuyo viya hetupaccayā honti, pañcavokāre lokuttaravipākahetavo cittajānaṃ rūpānañca sampayuttānañca pañcavokārabhūmiyaṃ hetupaccayā honti. Catuvokāre lokuttaravipākajā hetavo sampayuttānaṃ eva catuvokārabhūmiyaṃ hetupaccayā bhavanti. ^b^Itare^eb^ catuvokāre arūpabhave vipākajā hetavo sampayuttānaṃ eva ^b^sabhūmiyaṃ^eb^ attano ^a^M0.0093^ea^ bhūmiyaṃ arūpabhūmiyaṃ hetupaccayā honti. ^b^Hetuttho^eb^ hetūnaṃ attho ^b^hetuyo ceva^eb^ hetupaccayo ceva ^b^hetupaccayasambhavo^eb^ hetupaccayuppatti, ^b^evameva^eb^ evaṃ iminā pakārena. Sañjāto sukhahetu yassāti ^b^sañjātasukhahetu,^eb^ tena viññeyyo.

556-8.^b^Chando cittañca vīriyaṃ^eb^ vīmaṃsā cāti catudhādhipatī lokādhipatinā satthunā vuttā. Chandaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā cittassa uppattikālasmiṃ yo chando, ^b^so^eb^ chandādhipati nāma, chandaṃ dhuraṃ katvā samādhikaraṇacittassa eseva nayo ^b^sesesupi ca tīsu^eb^ mayā vuttato chandādhipatito sesesupi ca adhipatīsu. Yo dhammo jeṭṭhaṭṭhena upakārako, so dhammo ^b^adhipatīti^eb^ adhipati nāma bhagavatā niddiṭṭho.
^b^Sumatimativibodhanaṃ^eb^^a^V1.0077^ea^^b^vicittaṃ,^eb^
^b^Kumatimatindhanapāvakaṃ padhānaṃ;^eb^
^b^Imamatimadhuraṃ avedi yo yo,^eb^
^b^Jinavacanaṃ sakalaṃ avedi so so.^eb^

^b^Yo yo^eb^ jano ^b^imaṃ^eb^ abhidhammāvatāraṃ ^b^sumatimativibodhanaṃ^eb^ sumatīnaṃ sundaramatīnaṃ paṇḍitānaṃ matiyā vibodhanakaraṃ vicittaṃ kumatīnaṃ kucchitamatīnaṃ bālānaṃ matiindhane padhānaṃ pāvakaṃ atimadhurakaraṃ ^b^avedi^eb^ jāni, ^b^so so^eb^ jano sakalaṃ jinavacanaṃ ^b^avedi^eb^ jāni.
Iti abhidhammāvatāraṭīkāya
Pakiṇṇakaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
Aṭṭhamo paricchedo.
^b^Bāttiṃsapākacittāni^eb^^a^M0.0094^ea^, ^b^lokikāneva yāni hi;^eb^
^b^Etesaṃ pākacittānaṃ, paṭisandhipavattisu.^eb^

Yāni lokikāni eva bāttiṃsa pākacittāni honti, etesaṃ pākacittānaṃ puññāpuññādisaṅkhārā ^b^bhavādīsu^eb^ yonigativiññāṇaṭṭhitisattāvāsesu paṭisandhipavattīsu ^b^yathā^eb^ yena pakārena paccayā honti eva, imesaṃ vipākacittānaṃ ^b^tepi^eb^ saṅkhārā ^b^bhavādīsu^eb^ yonigativiññāṇaṭṭhitisattāvāsesu paṭisandhipavattīsu ^b^tathā^eb^ tena pakārena ^b^vibhāvinā^eb^ paṇḍitena viññātabbā. ^b^Tayo bhavā catasso ca yoniyo^eb^ kāmabhavarūpabhavaarūpabhavavasena tayo bhavā, aṇḍajajalābujasaṃsedajaopapātikayonivasena catasso ca yoniyo, nirayagatitiracchānagatipetagatimanussagatidevagativasena ^a^V1.0078^ea^^b^gatipañcakaṃ,^eb^ sandhisaññāya paṭisandhisaññāya nānattā nānābhāvato, kāyassāpi ca rūpakāyassāpi ca nānattā nānābhāvato kāmasugatiyo, nānā attā sabhāvo etassāti nānattā, nānatto rūpakāyo etesanti nānattakāyā, nānā sabhāvo etassāti nānattā, nānattāyeva saññā nānattasaññā, sā etesaṃ atthīti ^b^nānattasaññī^eb^ nāma, paṭhamajjhānabhūmi ca caturāpāyabhūmiyo ca ^b^nānattakāyaekattasaññī^eb^ nāma, dutiyajjhānabhūmi ^b^ekattakāyanānattasaññī^eb^ nāma, tatiyajjhānabhūmivehapphalabhūmisuddhāvāsabhūmiyo ^b^ekattakāyaekattasaññī^eb^ nāma, heṭṭhā ṭhitā rūpehi saddhiṃ sattaviññāṇaṭṭhitiyo, tiṭṭhanti viññāṇāni etthāti ṭhitiyo, viññāṇānaṃ ṭhitiyo ^b^viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo,^eb^ viññāṇassa abhāvato asaññībhūmi na gayhate, catutthāruppabhūmi ca ^a^M0.0095^ea^ paṭuviññāṇābhāvato na gayhate. Sattāvāsavasena asaññībhūmiṃ, catutthāruppabhūmiñca pana gahetvā te sattāvāsā nava eva honti.

563-8.^b^Kāme puññābhisaṅkhārasaññitā aṭṭha cetanā^eb^ pūrenti attano kārakaṃ pūrenti ca, ajjhāsayaṃ pujjañca bhavaṃ nibbattentīti puññāni, abhisaṅkharonti vipākaṃ, kammajarūpañcāti abhisaṅkhārā, puññāni eva abhisaṅkhārā puññābhisaṅkhārā, teyeva saññitā ^b^puññābhisaṅkhārasaññitā,^eb^ kāme puññābhisaṅkhārasaññitā aṭṭha cetanā. ^b^Navannaṃ pākacittānaṃ^eb^ upekkhāyuttāhetukamahāvipākavasena navannaṃ pākacittānaṃ kāmasugatiyaṃ pana nānā vattamānacetanākhaṇato paraṃ khaṇaṃ etassāti nānākhaṇaṃ, taṃ eva nānakkhaṇikaṃ, tameva kammaṃ ^b^nānakkhaṇikakammaṃ,^eb^ vattamānacetanāto parā atītacetanāti attho. Balavā nissayapaccayo ^b^upanissayapaccayo,^eb^ balavattho cettha ^b^upa^eb^-saddo, balavapaccayoti attho, nānakkhaṇikakammapaccayavasena balavapaccayavasena cāti attho. ^b^Dvedhā^eb^ dvīhi pakārehi tesaṃ paṭisandhiyaṃ paccayā bhavanti, tā aṭṭha kāmāvacaramahākusalacetanā ^b^upekkhāsahitāhetumanoviññāṇadhātuyā vinā^eb^ upekkhāsahagatāhetumanoviññāṇadhātuṃ vajjetvā ^b^parittapākānaṃ^eb^ cakkhusotaghānajivhākāyasampaṭicchanasomanassayuttāhetukakusalavipākānaṃ ^b^dvedhā^eb^ nānakkhaṇikakammūpanissayapaccayehi pavattiyaṃ paccayā honti. ^b^Tāyeva cetanā^eb^ tā eva aṭṭha kāmāvacaramahākusalacetanā rūpabhave ^b^pañcannaṃ pākacittānaṃ^eb^ kusalavipākacittānaṃ cakkhusotasampaṭicchanasomanassayuttaupekkhāyuttasantīraṇānaṃ ^b^dvedhā^eb^ nānakkhaṇikakammūpanissayapaccayehi pavattiyaṃ paccayā honti. ^b^Aṭṭhannaṃ tu parittānaṃ, kāme duggatiyaṃ tathā^eb^ aṭṭhannaṃ parittānaṃ kusalavipākānaṃ cakkhusotaghānajivhākāyasampaṭicchanānaṃ, dvinnaṃ ^a^M0.0096^ea^ santīraṇānañca ^b^pavatte^eb^ pavattikkhaṇe ^a^V1.0079^ea^ paccayā honti, ^b^paṭisandhiyaṃ^eb^ paṭisandhikkhaṇe pana paccayā na honti. ^b^Vuttappakārāva kāme sugatiyaṃ^eb^ yathāvuttappakārāva aṭṭha kāmāvacaramahākusalacetanā kāmasugatiyaṃ tathā soḷasannaṃ kusalavipākānaṃ ^b^pavatte^eb^ pavattikkhaṇe ^b^dvedhā^eb^ nānakkhaṇikakammūpanissayapaccayehi paccayā honti, ^b^pavatte^eb^ pavattikkhaṇe sattannaṃ kusalavipākānaṃ paccayā honti. ^b^Paṭisandhiyaṃ^eb^ paṭisandhikkhaṇe navannaṃ kusalavipākacittānaṃ paccayā honti.

569-74.^b^Rūpe puññābhisaṅkhārā, rūpāvacarabhūmiyaṃ^eb^ pañcannaṃ pākacittānaṃ ^b^paṭisandhiyaṃ^eb^ paṭisandhikkhaṇe paccayā ^b^hontimāpuññasaṅkhārā, kāme duggatiyaṃ dvidhā^eb^ ime apuññābhisaṅkhārā, ^b^imā^eb^ kusalapaṭipakkhā uddhaccavajjā ekādasa cetanā kāmaduggatiyaṃ ekassa paṭisandhiviññāṇassa ^b^paṭisandhiyaṃ^eb^ paṭisandhikkhaṇe ^b^dvidhā^eb^ nānakkhaṇikakammūpanissayapaccayehi paccayā honti. Dvādasa akusalacetanā ^b^pavatte^eb^ pavattikkhaṇe eva ^b^channaṃ^eb^ cakkhusotaghānajivhākāyasampaṭicchanānaṃ akusalavipākānaṃ paccayā honti, ^b^paṭisandhiyaṃ^eb^ paṭisandhikkhaṇe paccayā no honti. ^b^Sattannampi bhavanteva pavatte^eb^ pavattikkhaṇe ^b^paṭisandhiyaṃ^eb^ paṭisandhikkhaṇe akusalavipākāni sattannaṃ cakkhusotaghānajivhākāyasampaṭicchanasantīraṇānaṃ paccayā bhavanti. ^b^Kāme sugatiyaṃ tesaṃ, sattannampi tatheva ca^eb^ dvādasākusalacetanā kāme sugatiyaṃ tatheva ca tesaṃ sattannaṃ akusalavipākānaṃ ^b^pavatte^eb^ pavattikkhaṇe paccayā honti, ^b^paṭisandhiyaṃ^eb^ paṭisandhikkhaṇe paccayā na honti. ^b^Viññāṇānaṃ catunnampi, tesaṃ rūpabhave tathā^eb^ tāyeva dvādasākusalacetanā rūpabhave ^b^tesaṃ^eb^ catunnaṃ akusalavipākānaṃ cakkhusotasampaṭicchanasantīraṇasaṅkhātānaṃ viññāṇānaṃ tathā ^b^pavatte^eb^ pavattikkhaṇe paccayā honti, ^b^paṭisandhiyaṃ^eb^ paṭisandhikkhaṇe ^a^M0.0097^ea^ paccayā na honti. ^b^So ca kāmabhaveniṭṭharūpādiupaladdhiyaṃ^eb^ so ca apuññābhisaṅkhāro kāmabhave aniṭṭharūpādiupaladdhiyaṃ amanāparūpādīni ārammaṇāni upaladdhiyaṃ tesaṃ catunnaṃ apuññajānaṃ viññāṇānaṃ paccayo hoti. ^b^Hi^eb^ saccaṃ ‘‘so ca kāmabhaveniṭṭha-rūpādiupaladdhiya’’ntiādikaṃ vacanaṃ. ^b^Aniṭṭharūpādayo^eb^ nāma visayā brahmaloke ^b^na vijjare^eb^ na vijjanti.

575-6.^b^Tathevāneñjasaṅkhāro^eb^ na iñjati na phandati na calatīti āneñjaṃ, āneñjañca taṃ saṅkhāro cāti āneñjasaṅkhāro, tathā eva ^b^āneñjasaṅkhāro^eb^ arūpāvacarabhūmiyaṃ catunnaṃ pākacittānaṃ ^b^pavatte^eb^ pavattikkhaṇe ^b^paṭisandhiyaṃ^eb^ paṭisandhikkhaṇe paccayo hoti. ^b^Bhavesvete^eb^ bhavesu ete vuttappakārā paccayā vuttappakārena paṭisandhipavattīsu ^b^yathā ca^eb^ yena yena ca pakārena ^a^V1.0080^ea^ nānakkhaṇikakammūpanissayapaccayehi paccayā honti, tena paccayā ^b^tathā^eb^ tena tena pakārena ^b^vibhāvinā^eb^ vijānantena paṇḍitena ñeyyā.

577.^b^Eseva ca nayo ñeyyo, yoniādīsu^eb^ yonigativiññāṇaṭṭhitisattāvāsesu eseva ca nayo bhavesu mayā vutto eva nayo paṇḍitena ñeyyo. ^b^Tatridaṃ^eb^ tatra bhavesu ādito paṭṭhāya vuttaṃ ^b^idaṃ^eb^ vacanaṃ ^b^mukhamattanidassanaṃ^eb^ upāyamattadīpanaṃ hoti.

578-81.^b^Avisesena puññābhi-saṅkhāro dvibhavesupi^eb^ kāmapuññābhisaṅkhāravasena, rūpapuññābhisaṅkhāravasena ca puññābhisaṅkhāro avisesena samānabhāvena dvīsu bhavesu kāmarūpabhavesu paṭisandhiṃ datvā ^b^so^eb^ saṅkhāro sabbapākaṃ ^b^janeti^eb^ nibbatteti. ^b^Tathā catūsu viññeyyo, aṇḍajādīsu yonisu^eb^ dvibhavesu puññābhisaṅkhāro viya tathā catūsu aṇḍajādīsu so puññābhisaṅkhāro paṇḍitena ñeyyo. ‘‘Aṇḍajādīsū’’ti ^a^M0.0098^ea^ vacanaṃ padumapaccekabuddhānaṃ manussattaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Bahudevamanussānaṃ vasena dvīsu gatīsu eva ca tathā so puññābhisaṅkhāro paṇḍitena ñeyyo. ^b^Tathā nānattakāyādi-viññāṇānaṃ ṭhitīsupi^eb^ nānattakāyanānattasaññīnānattakaāyaekattasaññī ekattakāyanānattasaññī ekattakāyaekattasaññīnaṃ vasena catūsu viññāṇaṭṭhitīsu so puññābhisaṅkhāro paṇḍitena ñeyyo. Nānattakāyanānattasaññīnānattakāyaekattasaññīekattakāyanānattasaññīekattakāyaekattasaññīnaṃ vasena ^b^vuttappakārasmiṃ^eb^ catubbidhe sattāvāse tathā so puññābhisaṅkhāro paṇḍitena ñeyyo. ^b^Evaṃ^eb^ iminā mayā vuttappakārena puññābhisaṅkhāro ^b^bhavādīsu^eb^ bhavayonigativiññāṇaṭṭhitisattāvāsesu yathārahaṃ soḷasannaṃ kāmakusalapākānaṃ, pañcannaṃ rūpapākānañcāti ^b^ekavīsatipākānaṃ dvidhā^eb^ nānakkhaṇikakammūpanissayapaccayena paccayo hoti.

582-3.^b^Kāme apuññasaṅkhāro^eb^ kāmabhave aṇḍajajalābujasaṃsedajaopapātikayonivasena aṇḍajādīsu ^b^yonīsu^eb^ nirayagatipetagatitiracchānagativasena ^b^tīsu gatīsu^eb^ nānattakāyaekattasaññīvasena ^b^ekissā viññāṇaṭṭhitiyā^eb^ nānattakāyaekattasaññīvasena ca ^b^ekasmiṃ pana sattāvāse dvidhā^eb^ nānakkhaṇikakammūpanissayapaccayehi ^b^pavatte^eb^ pavattikkhaṇe ^b^paṭisandhiyaṃ^eb^ paṭisandhikkhaṇe ^b^so^eb^ apuññābhisaṅkhāro paccayo hoti.

584-6.^b^Tathevāneñjasaṅkhāro^eb^^a^V1.0081^ea^ tathā eva āneñjasaṅkhāro, ^b^ekārūpabhave^eb^ ekasmiṃ arūpabhave ekissā opapātikayoniyā ceva ekissā devagatiyāpi ca ākāsānañcāyatanabhūmi viññāṇañcāyatanabhūmi ākiñcaññāyatanabhūmivasena ^b^tīsu eva cittaṭṭhitīsu^eb^ catunnaṃ arūpabhūmīnaṃ vasena ^b^catubbidhe^eb^ sattāvāse catunnaṃ arūpapākacittānaṃ ^b^dvedhā^eb^^a^M0.0099^ea^ nānakkhaṇikakammopanissayapaccayehi ^b^so^eb^ āneñjābhisaṅkhāro paccayo hoti. ^b^Paṭisandhipavattīnaṃ, vasenevaṃ bhavādīsu^eb^ evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena paṭisandhipavattīnaṃ vasena bhavādīsu yathā ^b^ye^eb^ saṅkhārā ^b^esaṃ^eb^ pākacittānaṃ paccayā honti, tathā te saṅkhārā evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena paṇḍitena vijānitabbā.

587-90.^b^Na rūpārūpadhammānaṃ, saṅkanti pana vijjati^eb^ rūpadhammānaṃ, cittacetasikasaṅkhātānaṃ nāmadhammānañca ^b^saṅkanti pana^eb^ saṅkamanaṃ pana na vijjati. ^b^Saṅkantibhāve asati^eb^ atītabhavato ^b^idha^eb^ imasmiṃ bhave rūpadhammānaṃ saṅkamanabhāve asati paṭisandhicittaṃ ^b^kathaṃ^eb^ kena pakārena ^b^siyā^eb^ bhaveyya? ^b^Natthi cittassa saṅkanti, atītabhavato idha^eb^ imasmiṃ bhave cittassa saṅkanti saṅkamanaṃ natthi, tato atītabhavato atītaṃ hetuṃ ^b^vinā^eb^ vajjetvā idha imasmiṃ bhave cittassa pātubhāvo na vijjati. ^b^Suladdhapaccayaṃ rūpārūpamattaṃ^eb^ suṭṭhu laddhapaccayaṃ rūpanāmamattaṃ jāyati. ^b^Evaṃ^eb^ iminā mayā vuttappakārena paccayaṃ labhitvā uppajjamānaṃ ^b^rūpārūpamattaṃ^eb^ rūpanāmamattaṃ jāyati. Evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena paccayaṃ labhitvā uppajjamānaṃ rūpārūpamattaṃ ^b^bhavantaraṃ^eb^ aññabhavaṃ paṭisandhiṃ ^b^upeti^eb^ upagacchati. ^b^Iti^eb^ vacanaṃ ^b^samaññāya^eb^ lokiyavohārena pavuccate, satto vā natthi, satto jīvoti vevacanaṃ, attā vāpi na vijjati.

591-9.^b^Tassidaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā, paṭisandhikkamaṃ pana tassa^eb^ sattassa ^b^idaṃ^eb^ paṭisandhikkamaṃ ^b^sudubbudhaṃ^eb^ atidubbijānaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā ahaṃ dassayissāmi, tametaṃ paṭisandhikkamaṃ ^b^sādhu^eb^ sādhukaṃ nibodhatha, ^b^sādhu^eb^ sādhukaṃ manasi karotha, vividhesu ārammaṇesu lobhavasena cittaṃ anāmetvā vajiramañjūsāya anagghamaṇiratanaṃ pakkhipanto viya citte ṭhapetvāti attho. ^b^Atītasmiṃ bhave tassa, āsannamaraṇassa hi^eb^ito ^a^M0.0100^ea^ bhavato atītasmiṃ bhave āsannamaraṇassa tassa sarīrasmiṃ ātape pakkhittaṃ haritaṃ tālapaṇṇaṃ viya sussamāne sati cakkhundriyādike indriye naṭṭhe hadayavatthumattasmiṃ ṭhite kāyappasādike viññāṇe tasmiṃ khaṇe ^b^vatthusannissitaṃ^eb^ hadayavatthunissitaṃ. ^b^‘‘Citta’’^eb^nti vacanaṃ bhavaṅgamanodvārāvajjanajavanaṃ sandhāya vuttanti veditabbaṃ. ^b^Pubbānusevita^eb^nti ^a^V1.0082^ea^ ito kālā pubbakāle tena pana anusevitaṃ anuciṇṇaṃ puññaṃ kammaṃ vā apuññaṃ eva vā kammaṃ kammanimittaṃ gatinimittaṃ vā kammaphalena dvāresu paccupaṭṭhitaṃ ālambitvā manodvārāvajjanajavanavasena sevitacittaṃ pavattati. ^b^Evaṃ^eb^ iminā mayā vuttappakārena pavattamānaṃ ^b^taṃ viññāṇaṃ^eb^ taṃ javanacittaṃ ^b^laddhapaccayaṃ^eb^ laddhārammaṇapaccayaṃ. ^b^Avijjāya paṭicchannādīnave visaye^eb^ti akusalajavane javite tassa javanassa avijjāya appaṭicchannadose tasmiṃ kammādike ārammaṇe kusalajavane javite tato cittavīthito pubbabhāge pavattāya avijjāya paṭicchannadose tasmiṃ kammādike ārammaṇe. ^b^Taṇhā^eb^ti akusalajavanena sahajo lobho, akusalajavane vā javite tato vīthicittato pubbabhāge pavatto lobho taṇhā. ^b^Nametī^eb^ti aññaṃ ārammaṇaṃ aggāhāpetvā daḷhaggāhavasena taṃ eva kammanimittagatinimittasaṅkhātaṃ ārammaṇaṃ gaṇhāpetīti attho. ^b^Sahajā saṅkhārā pana^eb^ tassa cittassa ^b^sahajā^eb^ ekato jātā cetanā pana tasmiṃ yevārammaṇe ^b^khipanti^eb^ pavattanti. Imasmiṃ paccuppannabhave ekasantativasā pavattāya taṇhāya namīyamānaṃ ^b^taṃ^eb^ viññāṇaṃ orimā tīramhā rajjukaṃ ālambitvā ^b^mātikātikkamo^eb^ puriso viya etaṃ purimaṃ nissayabhūtaṃ hadayavatthuṃ ^b^jahati^eb^ chaḍḍeti, cuticittaṃ uppajjitvā nirujjhatīti attho. ^b^Aparaṃ kammasambhūtaṃ nissayaṃ^eb^ aparaṃ aññakammato sambhūtaṃ nissayabhūtaṃ hadayavatthuṃ labhitvā vā alabhitvāpi vā ārammaṇādīhi ^a^M0.0101^ea^ paccayehi ^b^taṃ^eb^ paṭisandhisaṅkhātaṃ mānasaṃ pavattati. ‘‘Labhitvā’’ti vacanaṃ kāmarūpabhavaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. ‘‘Alabhitvā’’ti vacanaṃ arūpabhavaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. ^b^Ettha^eb^ etesu cittesu purimaṃ ‘‘jahatī’’ti vacanena vuttañceva cittaṃ, cuticittaṃ pacchimaṃ ‘‘ārammaṇādīhi paccayehi pavattatī’’ti vacanena vuttañceva cittaṃ paṭisandhicittaṃ paṇḍitena veditabbaṃ.

600-6.^b^Tadetaṃ^eb^ taṃ etaṃ paṭisandhicittaṃ purimā bhavato ^b^idha^eb^ imasmiṃ pacchimabhave nāpi āgataṃ, kammādiñca hetuṃ ^b^vinā^eb^ vajjetvā paṭisandhicittaṃ pātubhūtaṃ na ceva taṃ ^b^ettha^eb^ etasmiṃ vacane etassa paṭisandhicittassa purimā bhavato ^b^idha^eb^ imasmiṃ paccuppannabhave anāgamane ^b^atītabhavahetūhi^eb^ atītabhave kammādipaccayehi etassa paṭisandhicittassa sambhave. ^b^Paṭighosadīpamuddādī, bhavantettha nidassanā ettha^eb^ etasmiṃ tassa paṭisandhicittassa atītabhavato anāgamane atītabhave hetūhi sambhave paṭighosadīpamuddādiatthanidassanā upamā bhavanti. ^b^Aññatra^eb^ aññasmiṃ paṭighosādīnaṃ atthānaṃ pavattiṭṭhāne āgantvā ^b^saddādihetukā^eb^ saddādayo paccayā honti yathā. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – imasmiṃ ṭhāne janehi pavattāpitā saddadīpamuddādayo atthā ^a^V1.0083^ea^ pabbatantarādīsu aññesu ṭhānesu pavattānaṃ paṭighosadīpamuddādīnaṃ atthānaṃ hetukā honti. Tesu saddādīsu paccayesu santesu ye te paṭighosādayo honti, asantesu na honti yathā, ^b^evameva ca viññāṇaṃ^eb^ atītabhavato paccuppannabhavaviññāṇavasena pavattaṃ viññāṇaṃ vibhāvinā veditabbaṃ. ^b^Santānabandhato^eb^ santānabandhavasena ^b^ekatā^eb^ atītabhavapaccuppannabhavaviññāṇavasena pavattassa viññāṇassa ekībhāvo natthi, ^b^nānatāpi^eb^ tassa viññāṇassa nānābhāvopi paccekabhāvo api. ^b^Sati santānabandhe tu, ekantenekatā siyā^eb^ santānabandhe sati ekantena tassa ^a^M0.0102^ea^ viññāṇassa ^b^ekatā^eb^ ekībhāvo ^b^siyā^eb^ bhaveyya, khīrasabhāvato paggharaṇasabhāvato ^b^khīrato^eb^ sambhūtaṃ ghanasabhāvaṃ ^b^kadācipi^eb^ kismiñcipi kāle na bhaveyya, sabbadā paggharaṇasabhāvakhīrameva bhaveyyāti attho. ^b^Athāpi^eb^ aparo nayopi sā ^b^ekantanānatā^eb^ tassa viññāṇassa so ekantanānābhāvo yadi bhaveyya, khīrasāmiko ^b^so^eb^ puggalo dadhisāmi na bhaveyya. Khīrakāle khīrassa issarabhūto sāmiko paggharaṇasabhāvaṃ jahitvā dadhissa uppajjamānakāle tassa dadhissa issaro na bhaveyya, tato khīrasāmiko añño puggalo tassa dadhissa anissaro asāmiko bhaveyyāti attho. Yasmā kāraṇā ^b^ettha^eb^ etasmiṃ paṭisandhikkamavinicchaye ekantaekatāpi vā ekantanānatāpi vā samayaññunā viññunā na ceva upagantabbā.

607-10.^b^Evaṃ^eb^ iminā mayā vuttappakārena ^b^asaṅkantipātubhāve^eb^ saṅkantipātubhāvarahite bhave sati imasmiṃ manussattabhāve khandhādisamatā abhisambhūtā ye khandhā honti, etesaṃ ^b^idha^eb^ imasmiṃ manussattabhāve niruddhattā ^b^idha^eb^ imasmiṃ manussattabhāve janehi katassa ^b^tassa kammassa phalahetuno^eb^ phalassa paccayabhūtassa ^b^parattha^eb^ parasmiṃ loke āgamato ceva evaṃ ^b^aññassa^eb^ sattassa ^b^aññato kammato^eb^ hi tato sattato aññena sattena katato aññato ceva kammato taṃ phalaṃ ^b^siyā^eb^ bhaveyya, ‘‘aññassa sattassā’’ti vacanena titthiyasattassapi kammaṃ aññassa ca phalaṃ dadeyyāti attho, ^b^tasmā^eb^ kāraṇā etaṃ sabbaṃ eva ca tumhehi vuttavidhānaṃ na sundaraṃ. ^b^Etthāhā^eb^ti etasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhatvā codako āha – nanu evaṃ ‘‘asaṅkantipātubhāve bhave satī’’tiādikaṃ vacanaṃ niyatīti? Vuccate – ^b^santāne yaṃ phalaṃ etaṃ^eb^ ekasmiṃ ^a^M0.0103^ea^ santāne pavattamānaṃ yaṃ etaṃ phalaṃ ^b^aññassa^eb^ sattassa na hoti, ^b^aññato^eb^ kammato na ca hoti, bījānaṃ abhisaṅkhāro ^b^etassatthassa^eb^ ‘‘ekasmiṃ santāne’’tiādikassa etassa atthassa ^b^sādhako^eb^ nipphādako hoti.

611-5.^b^Ekasmiṃ^eb^^a^V1.0084^ea^^b^pana santāne, vattamānaṃ phalaṃ pana aññassa^eb^ sattassāpi vā na hoti, taṃ phalaṃ ^b^aññato^eb^ kammato na hoti. Bījānaṃ abhisaṅkhāro ^b^etassatthassa^eb^ ‘‘ekasmiṃ pana santāne’’tiādikassa etassa atthassa ^b^sādhako^eb^ nipphādako hoti, bījānaṃ abhisaṅkhāre ^b^madhuādinā^eb^ vatthunā janehi kate tassa bījassa santāne ^b^paṭhamaṃ laddhapaccayo^eb^ paṭhamaṃ laddhamadhuādipaccayo tassa bījassa phalaṃ ^b^kālantare^eb^ madhuādinā bījābhisaṅkharaṇato aññasmiṃ kāle madhuro hoti. ^b^Hi^eb^ saccaṃ ‘‘bījānaṃ abhisaṅkhāre’’tiādikaṃ vacanaṃ. ^b^Tāni hi^eb^ tāni eva paṭhamaṃ madhuādinā janehi ropitāni ^b^bījāni^eb^ abhisaṅkharaṇato kālantare madhurabhāvaṃ phalampi vā phalaṭṭhaṃ vā na pāpuṇanti. ^b^Evaṃ^eb^ iminā pakārena ^b^idaṃ^eb^ mayā vuttaṃ ‘‘ekasmiṃ pana santāne’’tiādikaṃ vacanaṃ paṇḍitena ñeyyaṃ. ^b^Api ca^eb^ aparo nayo. ^b^Bālakāle^eb^ taruṇakāle tena taruṇena ^b^payuttena vijjāsipposadhādinā^eb^ kammenāpi tassa vuddhakālasmiṃ phaladānasīlena ^b^ayaṃ^eb^ ‘‘ekasmiṃ pana santāne’’tiādiko attho paṇḍitena dīpetabbo.

616-20. Codako punāha – ^b^evaṃ santepi taṃ kammaṃ evaṃ^eb^ iminā mayā vuttappakārena kamme ^b^santepi^eb^ saṃvijjamānepi taṃ kammaṃ etasmiṃyeva khaṇe vijjamānampi vā phalassa paccayo hoti. ^b^Atha vāvijjamānakaṃ^eb^ paccayo na bhaveyya. Etasmiṃyeva khaṇe avijjamānakaṃ kammaṃ vā phalassa paccayo hoti. ^b^Sace^eb^ yadi vijjamānaṃ phalassa paccayo hoti, ^b^tappavattikkhaṇe^eb^^b^pana^eb^^a^M0.0104^ea^ tassa kammassa pavattikkhaṇe tassa kammassa vijjamānakāle pana ^b^hetunā^eb^ kammeneva saddhiṃ pākena bhavitabbaṃ. ^b^Atha vā^eb^ aparo nayo. Vijjamānaṃ ^b^niruddhaṃ^eb^ kammaṃ vipākassa paccayo yadi bhaveyya, ^b^pavattikkhaṇato^eb^ tassa kammassa pavattikkhaṇato ^b^pubbe^eb^ vā kāle, tassa kammassa pavattikkhaṇato pacchā vā avijjamānakāleti attho. ^b^Niccaphalaṃ siyā^eb^ti sabbadā kammapaccayavirahitaṃ phalaṃ siyāti attho. Ācariyena vuccate – ‘‘lobhaṃ, bhikkhave, pajahatha, sotāpattipaṭilābhāya ahameva pāṭibhogo’’tiādīsu pāṭhesu pāṭibhogo viya kammaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sotāpattiphalaṃ viya kammato sambhūtaṃ phalaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Kaṭattāyeva^eb^ janehi kaṭattāyeva taṃ kammaṃ phalassa paccayo hoti, assa vijjamānattaṃ na ca hoti, ^b^tassa^eb^ avijjamānassa kammassa vijjamānatā vā ^b^na ca^eb^ neva hoti.

621.^b^Abhidhammāvatāroyaṃ^eb^ abhidhammāvatāro ayaṃ ^b^paramatthappakāsano^eb^ bhūtatthadīpano ^b^sotūnaṃ^eb^ puggalānaṃ ^a^V1.0085^ea^^b^pītibuddhivivaḍḍhano^eb^ paṇḍitehi vividhesu ārammaṇesu cittaṃ anāmetvā sakkaccena manasikārena sotabbo.
Iti abhidhammāvatāraṭīkāya
Puññavipākapaccayaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
Navamo paricchedo.

622.^b^Vuttamādimhi yaṃ rūpaṃ, cittajānamanantaraṃ^eb^ yaṃ rūpaṃ cittacetasikānaṃ anantaraṃ ādimhi pakaraṇādimhi ‘‘cittaṃ cetasikaṃ ^a^M0.0105^ea^ rūpa’’ntiādinā vacanena ācariyena vuttaṃ, ito paraṃ idāni tassa rūpassa vibhāvanaṃ ^b^samāsena^eb^ saṅkhepena karissaṃ.

623.^b^Yaṃ ruppatīti rūpa^eb^nti yaṃ dhammajātaṃ ruppati sītādinā viruddhapaccayena vikāramāpajjati. ^b^Tathā rūpayatīti rūpaṃ^eb^ yaṃ dhammajātaṃ vaṇṇavikāramāpajjamānaṃ hadayaṅgatabhāvaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ pakāseti, iti tasmā rūpaṃ, kiṃ taṃ? Vaṇṇāyatanaṃ. ^b^Rūpārūpabhavātīto, surūpo rūpamabrvi^eb^ bhagavā rūpārūpabhavaatīto surūpo rūpaṃ ^b^abrvi^eb^ kathesi.
625-6.^b^Mahābhūtenā^eb^ti mahanto bhūto uppatti etassāti mahābhūto, tena. Vañcakattā mahābhūtasamāti vā.
630.^b^Nirupādānamānaso^eb^ti upādānavirahitacitto.
633.^b^Tassa^eb^^a^V1.0086^ea^^b^sampattī^eb^ti tassa kiccassa sampatti.
634.^b^Upabrūhanarasā^eb^ti vaḍḍhanakiccā.
637.^b^Āsayānusaye ñāṇa^eb^nti ettha ^b^āsayo^eb^ nāma
Sassatucchedadiṭṭhī ca, khantī saccānulomikaṃ;
Yathābhūtañca yaṃ ñāṇaṃ, etaṃ āsayasadditaṃ.

Atthīti kho, kaccāna, ayameko anto, anto kho, kaccāna, atthi iti ayaṃ eko anto koṭṭhāso, ayaṃ ^b^sassatadiṭṭhi^eb^. Natthīti kho, kaccāna, ayaṃ dutiyo anto, ayaṃ ^b^ucchedadiṭṭhi. Khantī saccānulomika^eb^nti catunnaṃ saccānaṃ anulomikañāṇaṃ, saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇanti attho. ^b^Yathābhūtañca yaṃ ñāṇa^eb^nti sappaccayanāmarūpadassanaṃ ñāṇaṃ. ^b^Etaṃ^eb^^b^āsayasaddita^eb^nti ^a^M0.0106^ea^ etaṃ āsayaṃ iti kathitaṃ. Evaṃ vuttappakārena āsaye ñāṇaṃ nāma. ^b^Anusayo^eb^ nāma diṭṭhānusayādayo anusayā satta. ^b^Indriyānaṃ paropare^eb^ti pare adhikabhāvena opare ca tikkhānubhāvena ayaṃ satto tikkhasaddhindriyo mudusaddhindriyo hīnasaddhindriyoti attho. Samādhindriyādīsupi eseva nayo. Iti sattānaṃ indriyānaṃ paraopare ñāṇaṃ.
638.^b^Sabbaññutā ñāṇa^eb^nti tihetukakāmāvacarakriyācatukkaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
641. Akkhikūṭehi matthaluṅgena paricchinno antato.
645.^b^Bhāvasambhavasaṇṭhānā^eb^ti itthipumasambhavabhūtavaṇṇāyatanaṃ.
647. Ete dasa catusamuṭṭhānā sambhārā catūhi paccayehi cattālīsa bhavanti.
652.^b^Niviṭṭhe^eb^ti patiṭṭhite.
658.^b^Ubbiadhikānaṃ^eb^^a^V1.0087^ea^ pathavīadhikānaṃ.
660-2.^b^Visese satī^eb^ti nissayabhūtānaṃ catunnaṃ visese sati, ^b^sabbaso^eb^ sabbesaṃ visesaparikappanaṃ pahāya eva kammavisesena pasādānaṃ visesatā ñeyyā.
663.^b^Saddīyatī^eb^ti uccārīyate. ^b^Rasantī^eb^ti assādenti.
668.^b^Parato^eb^ti paṭhamakappato aparabhāge paṭisandhiyaṃ bhāvadvayaṃ samuṭṭhātīti viññeyyaṃ. ^b^‘‘Pavattepi samuṭṭhāyā’’^eb^tiādikaṃ soṇakumārādayo sandhāya vuttaṃ.
672.^b^Na taṃ byañjanakāraṇa^eb^nti taṃ indriyadvayaṃ byañjanassa kāraṇaṃ na siyā. ^b^Tassā^eb^ti byañjanassa.
674.^b^Ubbāhana^eb^nti ^a^M0.0107^ea^ nīharaṇaṃ.
676-7. Annapānādikaṃ vatthu yaṃ kammajaṃ aggiṃ harati, ^b^kevalaṃ^eb^ ekaṃ hutvā taṃ annapānādikaṃ vatthu jīvitaṃ pana pāletuṃ na ca sakkoti. Ekato jīvitaṃ pāletuñca sakkonti.

^b^Kāyena^eb^ rūpakāyena attano bhāvaṃ viññāpentānaṃ bhāvo ^b^kāyaggahaṇānusārena^eb^ kāyaggahaṇassa anucintanena ^b^gahitāya^eb^ vāyodhātuvikārasaṅkhātāya ^b^etāya^eb^ dhammajātiyā paṇḍitehi viññāyate. ^b^Itipi^eb^ tasmā kāyaviññatti.
681. Ekāvajjanavīthiyaṃ heṭṭhā chahi cittehi vāyodhātusamuṭṭhitaṃ upatthambhaṃ labhitvā.
684.^b^Saha saddena vā^eb^ti saddena saheva.

690-1.^b^Etāsaṃ^eb^ pana lahutādīnaṃ tissannaṃ pavattiyaṃ nidassanaṃ kamato ārogyaṃ lahutā ^a^V1.0088^ea^, madditaṃ dhammaṃ mudutā, dhantahemaṃ kammaññatā hoti. Lahutādittayaṃ pana kammaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti, āhārādittayaṃyeva lahutādittayaṃ karoti yasmā, tato taṃ tijaṃ nāma.

693.^b^Vuttamākāranānattā^eb^ti ettha ākāranānattā nāma ācayākāraanubandhatākāravasena vuttaṃ. ^b^Veneyyānaṃ vasena vā^eb^ti eke veneyyā ācayavasena jātirūpaṃ jānanti, eke anubandhatāvasena jānanti. Iti veneyyānaṃ jānanavasena jātirūpaṃ dvidhā vuttaṃ.
694.^b^Sabhāvānapagame^eb^ attano sabhāvassa anapagame sati.

^b^Te^eb^^a^M0.0108^ea^ middharūpavādācariyā paṭikkhipitabbā. Kathaṃ? ^b^Addhā munisi sambuddho, natthi nīvaraṇā tavā^eb^ti yo tvaṃ ^b^addhā^eb^ ekantena ^b^muni asi^eb^ sambuddho asi nīvaraṇā dhammā ^b^tava^eb^ tuyhaṃ natthi, ^b^iti^eb^ vacane sace middhaṃ nīvaraṇaṃ rūpe paviṭṭhaṃ siyā. Bhagavatā rūpakāyassa vijjamānattā ‘‘natthi nīvaraṇā tavā’’ti vacanaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā. Thinamiddhanīvaraṇaṃ avijjānīvaraṇena saha nīvaraṇañceva hoti, nīvaraṇasampayuttañca hoti. Iti sampayuttavacanato sampayuttassa rūpassa abhāvato tampi na vattabbaṃ siyā. Na purejātapaccayāti aññamaññapaccayāti attho. Sace thinamiddhaṃ rūpaṃ siyā, kathaṃ arūpepi aññamaññaṃ siyā, na siyāti attho.
