Arūpepi kāmacchandanīvaraṇaṃ paṭicca thinamiddhanīvaraṇaṃ uppajjati. ^b^Iti^eb^ vacanena ca na middharūpaṃ siyā, arūpe kathaṃ siyāti attho. Arūpameva middhaṃ iti paṭikkhipitabbā. Arūpepi etassa middhassa uppattiyā sādhakavacanato niṭṭhaṃ ettha ca avagantabbaṃ ‘‘arūpa’’nti viññunā.

705-6.^b^Kammena vīsati rūpā^eb^ti aṭṭhindriyavatthuaṭṭhāvinibbhogasantatūpacayākāsā kammajā. ^b^Cetasā^eb^ viññattidvayasaddalahutādittayaavinibbhogasantatūpacayākāsā cittajā. ^b^Utunā^eb^ saddalahutādittayaavinibbhogasantatūpacayākāsā utujā. ^b^Āhārato^eb^ lahutādittayaavinibbhogasantatūpacayākāsā āhārajā.

707-17.^b^Jāyeyyuṃ yadi tānipī^eb^ti tāni jaratāaniccatārūpā yadi jāyeyyuṃ, evaṃ sante tu tesaṃ jaratāaniccatā bhedā siyuṃ. ^b^Hi^eb^ saccaṃ vacanaṃ pāko na paccati, bhedo vā na ^a^V1.0089^ea^ ca bhijjati yasmā, tasmā tesaṃ pākabhedā siyunti, ^b^taṃ^eb^ vacanaṃ natthi. ^b^Etaṃ^eb^ jaratāaniccatādvayaṃ ^b^jātassa^eb^ nipphannarūpassa pākabhedattā na jāyati. ^b^Siyā kassaci buddhetthā^eb^ti ^b^ettha^eb^ jaratāaniccatāvinicchayādhikāre ^b^kassaci^eb^ janassa ^b^buddhi^eb^ ñāṇaṃ yadi siyā, ‘‘rūpassūpacayo’’ti vacanena ‘‘jāti ^a^M0.0109^ea^ jāyatī’’ti vacanaṃ dīpitaṃ yathā, ^b^evaṃ^eb^ tathā pākopi paccatu, bhedopi paribhijjatu, evaṃ buddhi siyā. Jāti na ceva jāyate. ^b^Iti^eb^ iminā pakārena vibhāvinā ñeyyā. Jāti jāyamānassa nipphannarūpassa nibbatti nāma pakāsitā. ^b^Tattha yassa siyā tattha^eb^ vacane ^b^yassa^eb^ janassa buddhi siyā. Yesaṃ nipphannarūpadhammānaṃ jāti atthi, ^b^sā^eb^ jāti abhinibbattisammutiṃ ^b^tappaccayattavohāraṃ^eb^ tesaṃ nipphannarūpadhammānaṃ paccayaṭṭhena laddhavohāraṃ kammajādikaṃ vohāraṃ labhateva yathā, tathā ^b^tesaṃ^eb^ nipphannarūpadhammānaṃ te pākabhedā abhinibbattisammutiṃ nāma tappaccayattavohāraṃ labhanti, iti buddhi siyā. Tassa janassa evaṃ vattabbaṃ – idaṃ santatūpacayadvayaṃ kammādisambhavaṃ hoti yathā, evaṃ pākabhedā taṃ kammādisambhavavohāraṃ kadācipi na labhanti. ^b^Hi^eb^ saccaṃ vacanaṃ ^b^kasmā^eb^ kāraṇā janakānaṃ kammādipaccayānaṃ ānubhāvasaṅkhāte khaṇuppāde tesaṃ pākabhedānaṃ abhāvato na labhanti. Vuttappakārena khaṇuppāde jātiparamparābhāvato sā jāti labbhate, tasmā kāraṇā jāti eva abhinibbattisammutiṃ paccayattavohāraṃ labhati, itaraṃ jaratāaniccatādvayaṃ pana na labhati. Taṃ jaratāaniccatādvayaṃ jiyyati iti bhijjati iti vā na vattabbaṃ hoti. Kasmā? Kammādipaccayānaṃ ānubhāvakkhaṇe ^b^tassa^eb^ jaratāaniccatādvayassa paccayānaṃ abhāvato.

718-23.^b^Aniccaṃ saṅkhatañcetaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ^eb^ aniccasaṅkhātaṃ ^b^itipi^eb^ vacanassa bhagavatā vuttattā jaratāaniccatādvayaṃ jāyati, evaṃ iti tvaṃ ce maññasi, ^b^evaṃ^eb^ ‘‘jāyati evā’’ti vacanaṃ bhagavatā na vattabbaṃ. ^b^Hi^eb^ kasmā kāraṇā? ‘‘Aniccaṃ saṅkhatañcetaṃ, jarāmaraṇamiccapī’’tivuttabhāvādinā ākāradesanāpariyāyena lesena bhagavatā aniccānaṃ nipphannarūpadhammānaṃ jarāmaraṇasaṅkhātaṃ sabhāvato jarāmaraṇaṃ aniccaṃ saṅkhatañcāpi ^a^M0.0110^ea^ cittajānaṃ vikārattā viññattiyo ‘‘cittajā’’ti vuttā viya, ^b^tathā^eb^ evaṃ bhagavatā vuttaṃ. ^b^Yadi evaṃ^eb^ atthe sati ^b^etaṃ^eb^ ruppanalakkhaṇattayaṃ ajātattā ca ^b^sabbathā^eb^ sabbākārena khaṃpupphaṃva natthi, asaṅkhataṃ nibbānaṃ viya niccaṃvāti ca codako vadeyya, natthi niccanti idaṃ ubhayavacanaṃ no bhagavatā vattabbaṃ. Kasmā? Nissayadhammānaṃ āyattabhāvena pavattito pathaviyādīnaṃ nissayānaṃ ^b^bhāve^eb^ sati tassa lakkhaṇattayassa bhāvato, tasmā khaṃpupphaṃva taṃ lakkhaṇattayaṃ na natthi, atthīti attho. Pathavīādīnaṃ ^a^V1.0090^ea^ abhāve taṃ lakkhaṇattayaṃ na ca labbhati yasmā, tasmā nibbānaṃ viya, tathā niccaṃ na.

724-5. Paricchedādayo ^b^anipphannā. Tesameva ca rūpānaṃ^eb^ tesameva nipphannarūpadhammānaṃ vikārattā ^b^nipphannā ceva saṅkhatā^eb^ sesavasena vuttānaṃ pabhedakatoti dassanato. Sesaṃ uttānatthameva.
^b^Gantuṃ panicche piṭakebhidhamme,^eb^
^b^Yo dhammasenāpatinā samattaṃ;^eb^
^b^Hitatthinā tena ca bhikkhunāyaṃ,^eb^
^b^Sakkacca sammā pana sikkhitabbo.^eb^

Yo bhikkhu abhidhamme piṭake dhammasenāpatinā samattaṃ sabhāvaṃ gantuṃ pāpuṇituṃ iccheyya, tena ca bhikkhunā hitatthinā sakkaccaṃ ādarena sammā tīraṇacintanasajjhāyanehi ayaṃ abhidhammāvatāro sikkhitabbo.
Iti abhidhammāvatāraṭīkāya
Rūpavibhāgavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
Dasamo paricchedo.

769.^b^Bhavābhavaṃ^eb^^a^M0.0111^ea^^b^vinanato^eb^ti khuddakaṃ, mahantaṃ bhavaṃ sibbanato. ^b^Sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggo^eb^ti sabbehi saṅkhārūpadhikilesūpadhikhandhūpadhīhi paṭinissajjanaṃ. ^b^Accutirasaṃ^eb^ acutisampattikaṃ. ^b^Nibbānaṃ puṭṭhenā^eb^ti sugatena nibbānaṃ puṭṭhena sāriputtattherena. ^b^Ubhinnaṃ suttāna^eb^nti dhammasenāpativuttānaṃ ^a^V1.0091^ea^ dvinnaṃ suttānanti attho. ^b^Khayassa upanissayattā^eb^ti khayassa balavakāraṇattā. Puthūnaṃ dhammānaṃ appamattakkhaṇe rāgādikkhayamattaṃ nibbānaṃ bhaveyya. Sabbe bālaputhujjanā samadhigatanibbānā sacchikatanirodhā bhaveyyuṃ. ^b^Kiñca bhiyyo^eb^ kiṃ uttari kāraṇañca atthīti attho. Rāgādīnaṃ saṅkhatattā tesaṃ saṅkhatānaṃ nibbānaṃ saṅkhatalakkhaṇaṃ bhaveyya. ^b^Kiṃ panetthā^eb^ti etesu khaṇesu kiṃ pana khaṇe tvaṃ vadesi. ^b^Khīṇesvevā^eb^ti bhavādīsu khīṇesu eva. ^b^Niruttaro^eb^ti nipphannahāro.
771.^b^Assaddho^eb^ti bāhirasaddhāya virahito. ^b^Vantāso^eb^ti vantā vamitā āsā taṇhā yenāti vantāso.

^b^Nissaraṇiyā^eb^ti nissaraṇe niyuttā. ^b^Yadidaṃ nekkhammaṃ^eb^ yaṃ idaṃ kāmānaṃ etaṃ nissaraṇaṃ nirodho, ^b^tassa^eb^ kiñcibhūtassa saṅkhatassa paṭiccasamuppannadhammajātassa nirodho nissaraṇanti, ^b^evaṃ^eb^ iminā pakārena vuttassa ^b^tassa^eb^ nissaraṇanāmakassa abhāvappattidosato nissaraṇanāmakānaṃ paṭhamajjhānaākāsānañcāyatanānampi abhāvo bhaveyya. ^b^Atthi nissaraṇa^eb^nti atthi nibbānaṃ. ^b^Uppādādīna^eb^nti uppādaṭṭhitibhaṅgānaṃ. ^b^Papañcābhāvato^eb^ti taṇhāmānadiṭṭhīnaṃ abhāvato.
772.^b^Apalokita^eb^nti adassanadhammaṃ.
774.^b^Abyāpajjha^eb^nti nidukkhaṃ. ^b^Akkhara^eb^nti akharaṃ.

777. Saddhābuddhikaraṃ ^a^M0.0112^ea^^b^tathāgatamate^eb^ jinavacane sammohaviddhaṃsanaṃ ^b^paññāsambhavaṃ^eb^ paññākāraṇaṃ sampasādanakaraṃ. ^b^Atthabyañjanasālina^eb^nti atthabyañjanasāravantaṃ sumadhuraṃ ^b^sāraññu^eb^ jinasāsanasāraññū ^b^vimhāpanaṃ^eb^ accherakaraṃ ^b^imaṃ^eb^ evaṃ vuttappakāraṃ abhidhammāvatāraṃ yo jānāti, so jano gambhīre ^b^nipuṇe^eb^ nipuṇañāṇagocare abhidhammapiṭake padaṃ ^b^niṭṭhaṃ^eb^ uttamasanniṭṭhānaṃ ^b^yāti^eb^ pāpuṇāti.
Iti abhidhammāvatāraṭīkāya
Nibbānaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
Ekādasamo paricchedo.
Saṅkhāyatīti ^a^V1.0092^ea^^b^saṅkhā,^eb^ kathīyatīti attho. ^b^Kinti^eb^ kiṃ iti kathīyati. ‘‘Aha’’nti ‘‘mama’’nti kathīyati.
^b^Tajjāpaññattī^eb^ti tassa cakkhusotādikassa anurūpavasena jātā paññattīti attho.
^b^Ekassavā^eb^ti ekassa nāmadhammassa ‘‘accho’’ti ^b^nāmaṃ^eb^ gahetvā ^b^bahūnaṃ^eb^ nāmadhammānaṃ ‘‘accho’’ti ^b^nāmaṃ^eb^ gahetvā. ^b^Samūhamevā^eb^ti nāmadhammānaṃ samūhaṃ eva.
Gahito pubbe saṅketo etenāti ^b^gahitapubbasaṅketaṃ^eb^. Kiṃ taṃ? ^b^Manodvārāvajjanajavanaviññāṇaṃ^eb^. Tena gahitāya paññattiyā ^b^viññāyati^eb^ ‘‘sattā’’ti ‘‘kammajā’’ti kathīyati.
Itthī ^a^M0.0113^ea^ ca puriso ca itthipurisā, te ādayo yesaṃ te ^b^itthipurisādayo,^eb^ tesaṃ.
778.^b^Tatiyā koṭī^eb^ti tatiyo koṭṭhāso.
Iti abhidhammāvatāraṭīkāya
Paññattiniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
Dvādasamo paricchedo.

^b^Vedakassā^eb^ti ^a^V1.0093^ea^ sukhadukkhavedakassa. ^b^Tadāyattavuttīna^eb^nti tesaṃ āyattā paṭibaddhā yesaṃ vipākānaṃ te tadāyattavuttino, tesaṃ. ^b^Atra^eb^ imasmiṃ ṭhāne ācariyena parihāro vuccate. ^b^Kutoyaṃ tava tatthānurodho^eb^ti tattha tasmiṃ aññassa attakārakassa abhāvepi sattusaṅkhātassa attano bhāvepi ayaṃ tava anurodho anunayo kuto kena kāraṇena ^b^idha^eb^ imasmiṃ asati kattari kusalādīnaṃ atthibhāve kammavirodho kuto kena kāraṇena. ^b^Athāpī^eb^ti aparo nayopi. ^b^Kiñcetthā^eb^ti ^b^ettha^eb^ etissaṃ codanāyaṃ ^b^kiñci^eb^ vattabbaṃ atthi, avasiṭṭhaṃ tāva brūhi, aparisamattā te codanā. ^b^Tassā^eb^ti attano. ^b^Kārakavedakattābhāvo^eb^ti kārakavedakattassa abhāvo siyā.

^b^Atha na bhavatī^eb^ti attano anāse cetanāpi anāso yadi na bhavati. ^b^Paṭiññā hīnā^eb^ti ‘‘cetanāya anañño attā’’ti paṭiññā hīnā. ^b^Vuttappakārato^eb^ti ‘‘attano anāse cetanāya nāso na bhavati’’iti vuttappakārato ^a^M0.0114^ea^. ^b^Viparīta^eb^nti ‘‘attano anāse cetanāya anāso’’iti viparītaggahaṇaṃ siyā. ^b^Attā nassatu, cetanā tiṭṭhatu, atha pana evaṃ na bhavatī^eb^ti attā nassatu, cetanā tiṭṭhatu, evaṃ gahaṇaṃ pana na bhavati. Anaññattapakkhaṃ ^b^pariccaja^eb^ pariccajāhi ‘‘cetanāya anañño attā’’ti. Paṭiññā hīnā yassa so ^b^paṭiññāhīno^eb^.

^b^Ubhinnaṃ^eb^ cetanattānaṃ ^b^ekadesatā^eb^ ekadesabhāvo natthi. ^b^Evañca satī^eb^ti evaṃ ubhinnaṃ ekadesassa abhāve sati ko doso iti tvaṃ ce vadeyyāsi. ^b^Yaṃ pana tayā vuttaṃ yathā rūparasagandhādīnaṃ ekadese vattamānānampi lakkhaṇato aññatta^eb^nti yaṃ vacanaṃ pana tayā vuttaṃ, ^b^taṃ^eb^ vacanaṃ ^b^ayuttaṃ,^eb^ nānurūpanti attho. ^b^Tava paṭiññā hīnā^eb^ti ‘‘ekadese vattamānānaṃ cetanattānaṃ lakkhaṇato aññatta’’nti paṭiññā hīnā.

^b^Evañca satī^eb^ti etaṃ cetanāya aññabhāve sati ko doso iti ce bhavaṃ vadeyya. ^b^‘‘Acetano^eb^^a^V1.0094^ea^^b^attā’’^eb^ti vacanaṃ, ^b^pubbe vuttadosato^eb^ti ‘‘pākāratarupāsāṇatiṇasadiso siyā’’ti pubbe vuttadosato.
780.^b^Atthi sattopapātiko^eb^ti opapātikā sattā atthi.
781.^b^Bhārādāna^eb^nti bhāraggahaṇaṃ. ^b^Bhāranikkhepana^eb^nti bhāroropanaṃ.
783. Ekassa puggalassa ^b^aṭṭhisañcayo^eb^ aṭṭhisamūho ekena kappena pabbatasamo rāsi siyā.
785. Bho ^b^māra^eb^, tvaṃ satto iti paccesi, kaṃ saddahasi, ‘‘satto’’ti gahaṇaṃ ^b^te^eb^ tava diṭṭhigataṃ, suddhasaṅkhārapuñjo ayaṃ, ^b^idha^eb^ loke satto na upalabbhati.
787.^b^Yo^eb^^a^M0.0115^ea^ bhikkhu imaṃ ganthaṃ accantaṃ satatampi cinteti, ^b^tassa^eb^ bhikkhuno paramā paññā ^b^vepulaṃ^eb^ vipulabhāvaṃ gacchati.

788. Yo bhikkhu ^b^imaṃ^eb^ abhidhammāvatāraṃ ^b^atimatikaraṃ^eb^ uttamaṃ abhiññāṇakaraṃ ^b^vimativināsakaraṃ^eb^ kaṅkhacchedakaraṃ ^b^piyakkaraṃ^eb^ pemakaraṃ sadā paṭhati, suṇāti, tassa bhikkhuno mati ^b^idha^eb^ sāsane ṭhite ^b^vikasati^eb^ paṭiphullati.
Iti abhidhammāvatāraṭīkāya
Kārakapaṭivedhavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
Terasamo paricchedo.

789-93.^b^Hitānaya^eb^nti ^a^V1.0095^ea^ hitāvahaṃ. ^b^Mānasañca sugata^eb^nti suṭṭhu pavattamānasañca. Madhurā atthavaṇṇanā etassāti ^b^madhuratthavaṇṇanaṃ. Uttaraṃ tu manussānaṃ, dhammato ñāṇadassana^eb^nti manussānaṃ lokiyadhammato uttaribhūtañāṇadassanalokuttaraṃ. ^b^Saṅkassarasamācāre^eb^ti saṅkāya kaṅkhāya saritabbasamācāre. Acchiddaṃ akkhaṇḍaṃ akammāsaṃ. ^b^Atthakāmenā^eb^ti attano hitakāmena.
797.^b^Duvidhalakkhaṇaṃ^eb^ cārittavārittalakkhaṇaṃ.
805.^b^Tesaṃ^eb^ caritānaṃ vomissakanayā.
807.^b^Savaṇṇakasiṇā^eb^ti nīlapītaodātalohitavaṇṇakasiṇā.
808. Taṃ ^a^M0.0116^ea^ ekakaṃ ^b^ānāpānaṃ^eb^ assāsapassāso.
809-10.^b^Maraṇūpasamāyuttā satī^eb^ti maraṇānussati upasamānussati. ^b^Āhāranissitasaññā^eb^ti āhāre paṭikūlasaññā. ^b^Dhātuvavatthāna^eb^nti catudhātuvavatthānaṃ.

811-2.^b^Anukūlā ime sabba-caritānanti vaṇṇitā^eb^ti yaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ saddhācaritassa anukūlaṃ, tameva paññācaritassa anukūlanti adhippāyo. ^b^Idaṃ sabbaṃ pana^eb^ vacanaṃ ^b^ekantavipaccanīkabhāvato^eb^ ekantapaṭipakkhabhāvato atisappāyato vuttaṃ, iti vibhāvinā ñeyyaṃ.
835.^b^Vipassanābhavasampatti-sukhānaṃ paccayā siyuṃ^eb^ vipassanāsampattisukhānaṃ bhavasampattisukhānaṃ paccayā siyuṃ.
838.^b^Sammaṭṭhānaṃ^eb^^a^V1.0096^ea^^b^manobhuno^eb^ti manobhuhadayo tassa hadayassa sammaṭṭhānaṃ.
844. Pattukāmena dhīmatā kasiṇaṃ kattabbaṃ.
845.^b^Saṃhārima^eb^nti ito cito ca haritabbakasiṇaṃ. ^b^Tatraṭṭhaka^eb^nti tasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhitaṃ ito cito ca anāharitabbaṃ kasiṇaṃ.
849.^b^Vivaṭṭaṃ pana micchatā^eb^ti nibbānaṃ icchantena vidatthicaturaṅgulaṃ vaṭṭaṃ kātuṃ ^b^taṃ^eb^ kasiṇaṃ vaṭṭati.
851-2.^b^Hatthapāsappamāṇasmiṃ, tamhā kasiṇamaṇḍalā^eb^ti tato kasiṇamaṇḍalato hatthapāsappamāṇasmiṃ padese vidatthicaturaṅgule ucce. ^b^Parimukhaṃ sati^eb^nti kammaṭṭhānābhimukhaṃ satiṃ.
853-4.^b^Nekkhamma^eb^nti jhānaṃ. Khemato ^b^daṭṭhuṃ^eb^ disvā ahaṃ imāya paṭipattiyā ^b^addhā^eb^ ekantena ^b^pavivekasukhassa^eb^ nibbānasukhassa bhāgī ^b^assaṃ^eb^ bhaveyyaṃ.
856. So ^a^M0.0117^ea^ kasiṇassa vaṇṇo tena yoginā na pekkhitabbo, kasiṇassa lakkhaṇaṃ na pekkhitabbaṃ ussadassa vasena vaṇṇaṃ amuñcitvā.

860.^b^Evaṃ^eb^ iminā vuttappakārena ^b^ekaggacetaso^eb^ ekaggacittassa yogino nimīletvā āvajjantassa ^b^yathā^eb^ yena pakārena kammaṭṭhānaṃ hoti ummīlite kālepi, ^b^tathā^eb^ tena pakārena taṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ āpāthaṃ ^b^yāti ce^eb^ yadi āgacchati, uggahameva uggahanimittaṃ.
864. Pādānaṃ dhovane papañcaparihāratthaṃ. ^b^Ekatalikā^eb^ti ekatalamattā.
865.^b^Taṃ^eb^ saṃhārimaṃ kasiṇamādāya.
866.^b^Samannāharitabba^eb^nti ^a^V1.0097^ea^ kammaṭṭhānaṃ sumanena āharitabbaṃ, manasikātabbanti attho. ^b^Takkāhaṭa^eb^nti vitakkena āhaṭaṃ phusitaṃ ^b^kare^eb^ kareyya.
868.^b^Ta^eb^nti taṃ nimittaṃ.

871-4.^b^Imassā^eb^ti paṭibhāganimittassa. ^b^Purimassā^eb^ti uggahanimittassa. Ko pana ayaṃ viseso? Thavikā nīharitaṃ ādāsamaṇḍalaṃ majjitaṃ viya. Toyade kāḷameghe setabalākā viya. Tadā taṃ uggahanimittaṃ padāletvāva ^b^niggataṃ^eb^ paṭibhāganimittaṃ. ^b^Tato^eb^ uggahanimittato. ^b^Ta^eb^nti taṃ paṭibhāganimittaṃ. Saṇṭhānavantañca vaṇṇavantañca na ca upaṭṭhākāramattaṃ. ^b^Paññaja^eb^nti paññāya jātaṃ.
877-8.^b^Upacārakkhaṇe tassā^eb^ti tassa samādhino upacārakkhaṇe. Nīvaraṇappahānena samādhino paṭilābhakkhaṇe pana ^b^aṅgānaṃ^eb^ vitakkādīnaṃ pātubhāvena iti dvīhi ākārehi.
879.^b^Dvinnaṃ^eb^^a^M0.0118^ea^^b^samādhīna^eb^nti upacārappanāsamādhīnaṃ.
882. Cakkavattiyagabbhova ratanaṃ viya assa anena sudullabhaṃ.
884.^b^Aya^eb^nti paṭisandhisanthāro.
891-2.^b^Samataṃ vīriyassevā^eb^ti vīriyasamabhāvaṃ. ^b^Layaṃ^eb^ līnabhāvaṃ īsakampi yantaṃ gacchantaṃ mānasaṃ āvajjanacittaṃ.

895-9. Bhavaṅgaṃ pana pacchijja ucchinditvā tadeva pathavīkasiṇaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā yogino manodvāramhi jāyati. ^b^Tato^eb^ti āvajjanato ^b^tatrevārammaṇe^eb^ tasmiṃ pathavīkasiṇasaṅkhāte ārammaṇe ^b^tassa^eb^ yogino javanāni cattāri vā pañca vā jāyante. Avasāne ^b^ekaṃ^eb^ javanamānasaṃ rūpāvacarikaṃ hoti, tasmiṃ rūpāvacarike vitakkādayo aṅgā. ^b^Aññehi^eb^ aññesaṃ cittānaṃ aññehi vitakkādīhi balavatarā honti. ^b^Tāni^eb^ appanābhāvaṃ appattāni appanācetaso ^a^V1.0098^ea^^b^parikammopacārato^eb^ parikammabhāvato parikammānīti vuccante, upacārabhāvato upacārānīti ca vuccante. Tāni javanāni appanāyānulomattā anulomāni eva ca vuccanti. ^b^Ettha^eb^ anulomakesu yaṃ sabbantimaṃ javanaṃ, taṃ gotrabhūti pavuccati.
901.^b^Gotrabhu diṭṭha^eb^nti gotrabhu nāma uddiṭṭhaṃ.

904-5.^b^Purimehi^eb^ javanehi yaṃ āsevanaṃ, taṃ balavapaccayaṃ ^b^laddhā^eb^ labhitvā chaṭṭhaṃ javanaṃ, sattamaṃ vā javanaṃ appeti. ^b^Iti^eb^ vacanaṃ pavuccati, ^b^ettha^eb^ vāde ^b^godatto^eb^ nāma ^b^ābhidhammiko^eb^ ācariyo āha. Chinnataṭe mukhaṃ yassa ^b^chinnataṭamukho^eb^.
908. Paccavekkhaṇā ^a^M0.0119^ea^ hetu yassa āvajjanassāti ^b^paccavekkhaṇahetukaṃ^eb^.
911-2. Kāmacchandassa nānāvisaye paluddhassa. Cetaso ekasmiṃ visaye samādhānena samādhi.
915. Sayañca atisantato sukhaṃ avūpasantasabhāvassa uddhaccakukkuccadvayassa paṭipakkhato vuttaṃ.
917.^b^Pañcaṅgavippayutta^eb^nti pañcanīvaraṇavippayuttaṃ. ^b^Pañcaṅgasaṃyuta^eb^nti vitakkādīhi yuttaṃ.
920-1.^b^Vepulla^eb^nti kammaṭṭhānassa vipulabhāvaṃ. Tañca paṭibhāganimittaṃ upacāraṃ vicāretvā vaḍḍhetuṃ vaṭṭati.

928-31.^b^Pamādayogino^eb^ti pamādavasena yogisampannassa kāmasahagatā saññāmanakkārā manasikārā ce caranti, tassa yogino taṃ jhānaṃ hānabhāgiyaṃ hoti. ^b^Sati santiṭṭhate tasmiṃ, santā tadanudhammatā^eb^ tasmiṃ paṭhamajjhāne tadanudhammatā tassa paṭhamajjhānassa anurūpā sati nikanti santā saṃvijjamānā santiṭṭhate santiṭṭhati, taṃ jhānaṃ mandassa yogino ṭhitibhāgiyaṃ hoti, ṭhitiṃ bhajati. Visesabhāgiyaṃ hoti, visesaṃ dutiyādibhāvanaṃ pāpuṇātīti attho. ^b^Nibbidāsaṃyutā^eb^^a^V1.0099^ea^^b^saññā, manakkārā^eb^ti nibbidāvipassanāsaṃyuttā saññāmanakkārā. ^b^Nibbedhabhāgiya^eb^nti lokuttarabhāgiyaṃ, lokuttaramaggabhāgiyanti attho.
933. Ayaṃ samāpatti ^b^āsannākusalārayo^eb^ āsannākusalārikā yasmā takkacārānaṃ thūlattā ca, tasmā kāraṇā ayaṃ samāpatti aṅgadubbalā.
935.^b^Nikanti^eb^nti taṇhaṃ. ^b^Pariyādāyā^eb^ti sosāpetvā.
936.^b^Vidhinā^eb^ti ^a^M0.0120^ea^ pubbe vuttavidhinā. ^b^Satassā^eb^ti satisampannassa.
938.^b^Nimittaṃ tu tadeva cā^eb^ti tameva paṭhamanimittaṃ ‘‘pathavī pathavī’’iti evaṃ manasā karontassa.
943.^b^Sampasādana^eb^nti saddhā. ^b^Majjhatta^eb^nti tatramajjhattatā.
944.^b^Duvaṅgahīna^eb^nti vitakkavicārahīnaṃ.
948. Pīti nāma ^b^cetaso^eb^ cittassa ^b^uppilāpanaṃ^eb^ uppilāpitattaṃ ^b^yato^eb^ yasmā kāraṇā.

961-2.^b^Āsannapītidosā^eb^ti pītiyeva dosā. ^b^Ettha^eb^ etasmiṃ tatiyajjhāne ^b^yadeva^eb^ yaṃ eva ^b^sukhaṃ iti^eb^ evaṃ sukhaṃ cetaso ^b^ābhogo^eb^ manasikāro. ^b^Evaṃ^eb^ iminā pakārena sukhassa thūlattā ^b^ayaṃ^eb^ samāpatti aṅgadubbalā hoti.
974-5. Sukhaṃ upekkhāya āsevanaṃ pana na hoti yasmā upekkhāya āsevanaṃ pana na hoti, yasmā upekkhāsahagatāni javanāni javanti, tasmā catutthajjhānaṃ upekkhāsahagataṃ samudīritaṃ.
976. Dutiyajjhānaṃ ^b^dvidhā^eb^ dvīhi koṭṭhāsehi ṭhitaṃ.

979.^b^Ayaṃ^eb^^a^V1.0100^ea^ abhidhammāvatāro sumadhuravarataravacano kaṃ nu janaṃ neva rañjayati, atinisitavisado buddhippacāro yassa so ^b^atinisitavisadabuddhippacāro,^eb^ so tena janena vedanīyo jānitabbo.
Iti abhidhammāvatāraṭīkāya
Rūpāvacarasamādhibhāvanāniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
Cuddasamo paricchedo.
982-3.^b^Rūpe^eb^^a^M0.0121^ea^^b^kho vijjamānasmi^eb^nti rūpakāye vijjamāne ^b^daṇḍādānādayo^eb^ daṇḍaggahaṇādayo. Iti ^b^rūpe^eb^ rūpakāye ādīnavaṃ disvā.
984.^b^Sūkarābhihatova sā^eb^ti sūkaraṃ anubandhito sā sunakho viya.
985.^b^Vasī^eb^ti yogī.

988-990.^b^Phuṭṭhokāsañca tena ta^eb^nti tena cittena phuṭṭhaṃ tamokāsaṃ ‘‘ananto ākāso’’iti ca manasā karonto eva ugghāṭeti. ^b^Iti^eb^ vacanaṃ vuccate, ayamañño nayo, ‘‘ākāso’’ iti manasā karonto taṃ kasiṇaṃ na saṃvelleti.
998. Rūpāvacarajjhānameva paccatthikaṃ ^b^rūpāvacarajjhānapaccatthikaṃ^eb^.
1004.^b^Ākāsaphuṭaviññāṇe^eb^ti ^a^V1.0101^ea^ phuṭameva viññāṇaṃ phuṭaviññāṇaṃ, tasmiṃ ākāsārammaṇe phuṭaviññāṇe.

1005-6. Ayaṃ ākāso ananto iti evaṃ taṃ ākāsameva pharitvā pavattaṃ viññāṇaṃ viññāṇañca ^b^iti^eb^ vacanaṃ vuccate. Viññāṇaṃ anantaṃ nāma na hoti, anantārammaṇattā ‘‘viññāṇaṃ ananta’’nti vuccate, taṃ viññāṇaṃ manakkāravasena api anantaṃ paridīpitaṃ.
1010. Paṭhamāruppaviññāṇassa abhāvo ^b^tassa eva^eb^ paṭhamāruppassa ^b^suññato^eb^ suññabhāvato.
1013.^b^Sati^eb^^a^M0.0122^ea^^b^tiṭṭhati bhiyyo^eb^ balavā sati tiṭṭhati.
1015. Abhāvake natthibhāve.
1017-8.^b^Dutiyāruppacakkhunā^eb^ti cakkhunā dutiyāruppaṃ ^b^‘‘natthi natthī’’tiādinā^eb^ ākārena parikammavasena manakkāre. ^b^Tassāpagamamattañca^eb^ tassa paṭhamāruppassa apagamamattañca.
1029. Yā nāma ayaṃ samāpatti abhāvamattampi gocaraṃ katvā ṭhassati, ayaṃ samāpatti ^b^vata^eb^ ekantena aho santāti padissati.
1033. Yāya saññāya nevasaññī, nāsaññī ca hoti, ^b^kevalaṃ^eb^ ekantena atha kho sā saññā edisī na hoti.

1035-7. Paṭusaññāya kiccassa neva karaṇato ^b^ayaṃ^eb^ samāpatti ‘‘nevasaññā’’ti niddiṭṭhāti catutthaāruppato sambhavā pavattā tejodhātu sukhodake dahanakiccaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti yathā, sā saṅkhāradhammānaṃ avasesattā.
1040. Pāsādatalañca ^a^V1.0102^ea^ sāṭikā ca.

1041. Yo pana bhikkhu ^b^imaṃ^eb^ rūpārūpajjhānasamāpattividhānaṃ sārataraṃ jānāti, so rūpārūpajjhānasamāpattipurekkho sekkho ^b^bhavaṃ^eb^ kāmabhavaṃ ^b^abhibhuyya^eb^ abhibhavitvā rūpārūpaṃ ^b^yāti^eb^ pāpuṇāti.
Iti abhidhammāvatāraṭīkāya
Arūpāvacarasamādhibhāvanāniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
Pannarasamo paricchedo.
1045.^b^Satā^eb^ti ^a^M0.0123^ea^ satisampannena. ^b^Anuyoga^eb^nti vīriyaṃ.
1047. Yogāvacarabhikkhunā nibbattitāsu abhiññāsu ^b^assa^eb^ yogāvacarassa bhikkhuno samādhibhāvanā ^b^niṭṭhaṃ^eb^ pariyosānaṃ gatā siyā.
1050.^b^Dante^eb^ti dante ṭhite. ^b^Acale^eb^ti acale ṭhite.

1052-4. Abhiññāya pādakaṃ kāraṇaṃ ^b^abhiññāpādakaṃ^eb^ yogī sataṃ vāpi sahassaṃ vāpi ^b^yadi^eb^ sace icchati, abhiññāpādakaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā ^b^tato^eb^ abhiññāpādakajhānato ^b^vuṭṭhāya^eb^ vuṭṭhahitvā ‘‘sataṃ homi, sataṃ homi’’ iti evaṃ kāmāvacaraparikammamānasaṃ katvā abhiññāya pādakaṃ kāraṇabhūtaṃ jhānaṃ ^b^punādhiṭṭhāti^eb^ puna āpajjitvā tato jhānato vuṭṭhāya puna adhiṭṭhāti ^a^V1.0103^ea^, sahādhiṭṭhānena cetasā adhiṭṭhānasaṅkhātena catutthajjhānacittena saha so yogī sataṃ hoti. Iddhividhañāṇaṃ.
1067-8.^b^Eso adhigatābhiñño^eb^ yogī ^b^pādakārammaṇena^eb^ catutthajjhānassa paṭibhāganimittasaṅkhātena ārammaṇena phuṭṭhe okāse gate pavatte pana sadde suṇāti. Dibbasotañāṇaṃ.
1069. Parassa cittaṃ pariyati paricchijjatīti cetopariyaṃ, tameva mānasaṃ ^b^cetopariyamānasaṃ^eb^.
1070.^b^Hadayaṃ pana nissāyā^eb^ti hadayavatthuṃ nissāya pavattamānalohitaṃ, hadayakose pavattaṃ ruhiranti attho.

1075.^b^Kāmāvacaracittañcāti^eb^^a^M0.0124^ea^ kāmāvacarasattānaṃ kāmāvacaracittañca. ^b^Rūpārūpesu^eb^ rūpabhavārūpabhavesu sattānaṃ mānasañca. Kiṃ bhūtaṃ? Sarāgādippabhedakaṃ mānasaṃ sabbaṃ cetopariyañāṇaṃ jānāti. Cetopariyañāṇaṃ.

1077-82.^b^Nisajjā sabbapacchimā^eb^ti sabbesaṃ iriyāpathānaṃ pacchā jātā nisajjā bhikkhunā āvajjitabbā. ^b^Tato pabhuti^eb^ tato sabbapacchimato nisajjāto pabhuti taṃ sabbaṃ pacchimanisajjaṃ ādiṃ katvā ^b^paṭilomakkamā^eb^ paṭilomakkamena ^b^sabbaṃ^eb^ attanā kataṃ āvajjitabbaṃ. Asmiṃ bhave ^b^yāva^eb^ yattakaṃ kālaṃ ^b^sandhi^eb^ paṭisandhi hoti, ^b^tāva^eb^ tattakaṃ kālaṃ ^b^kataṃ^eb^ kiriyaṃ tena bhikkhunā āvajjitabbaṃ. Purimasmiṃ bhavepi cutikkhaṇepi nibbattaṃ nāmarūpañca sādhukaṃ āvajjitabbaṃ. Cutikkhaṇe nibbatte tasmiṃ nāmarūpe evaṃ bhikkhunā āvajjitabbe yadā ^b^tadeva^eb^ tameva nāmarūpaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā cutikkhaṇe manodvāre ^b^manakkāro^eb^ manodvārāvajjanacittaṃ uppajjati. Pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇaṃ.

1086-96. Abhiññāpādakaṃ kasiṇārammaṇaṃ jhānaṃ abhinīhārakkhamaṃ katvā imesu tīsu kasiṇesu katapuññehi. ^b^Tasmā tamitaraṃ vāpī^eb^ti ālokakasiṇaṃ vā itaraṃ vāpi kasiṇadvayaṃ yathākkamaṃ ^a^V1.0104^ea^ uppādetvā upacārabhūmiyaṃyeva ṭhatvā ^b^taṃ^eb^ ālokakasiṇaṃ ṭhapetabbaṃ. Appanaṃ paṇḍito na uppādeyya, sace uppādeti, ^b^taṃ^eb^ ālokakasiṇaṃ ^b^pādakajjhānanissitaṃ^eb^ pādakajjhānassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti. Vaḍḍhitassa jhānassa antogadhaṃ rūpaṃ tena yoginā passitabbaṃ ^b^bhave^eb^ bhaveyya. Taṃ rūpaṃ ^b^passato^eb^ passantassa ^b^tassa^eb^ yogino parikammassa vāro atikkamati, ^b^tāvade^eb^ tasmiṃyeva khaṇe ālokopi ^b^tassa^eb^ yogino ālokopi khippaṃ antaradhāyati. ^b^Tasmiṃ^eb^ āloke antarahite ^a^M0.0125^ea^^b^rūpagataṃ^eb^ rūpaṃ na dissati. Divasampi nisīditvā passato rūpadassanaṃ hoti.
1100-1.^b^Taṃcittasaṃyuta^eb^nti tena catutthajjhānena yuttaṃ cittaṃ. Anāgataṃsañāṇassa parikammaṃ, yathākammūpagassa ñāṇassa ca parikammaṃ. Dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ.

1103. Yo bhikkhu ^b^idha^eb^ imasmiṃ sāsane imaṃ pana ganthaṃ suṇāti, citte karoti ca, so bhikkhu ^b^anena tarena^eb^ iminā ganthena taritvā abhidhammamahaṇṇavapāraṃ ^b^yāti^eb^ pāpuṇāti, jānātīti attho.
Iti abhidhammāvatāraṭīkāya
Abhiññāniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
Soḷasamo paricchedo.

1104.^b^Anāgataṃsañāṇañcā^eb^ti na āgato anāgato, na tāva sampattoti attho, anāgate aṃsā koṭṭhāsā tesaṃ ñāṇaṃ anāgataṃsañāṇaṃ. Yaṃ yaṃ kammaṃ yathākammaṃ, taṃ upagacchati jānātīti ^b^yathākammupagaṃ,^eb^ vipākacetanājānanakañāṇaṃ.

1107-9.^b^Tattha^eb^^a^V1.0105^ea^ tesu ārammaṇattikesu. ^b^Cittasannissitaṃ katvā^eb^ti taṃ kāyaṃ cittaṃ sannissitaṃ karitvā tameva kāyacittacetasikavasena mahaggate cittasmiṃ samāropeti ñāṇaṃ iddhividhañāṇaṃ, tato kāyārammaṇato kāyassa parittattā kāmāvacarattā parittārammaṇaṃ ñāṇaṃ siyā.

1110-3.^b^Dissamānena^eb^^a^M0.0126^ea^^b^kāyena, gantukāmo yadā bhave^eb^ yo yogī dissamānena kāyena gantukāmo yadā bhaveyya, so yogī tadā cittaṃ ^b^kāyasannissitaṃ katvā^eb^ rūpakāye sannissitaṃ katvā taṃ pādakajjhānacittaṃ kāyavasena kāye āropeti, tadā jhānārammaṇato taṃ ñāṇaṃ mahaggatagocaraṃ hoti, yaṃ ñāṇaṃ yadā ^b^anāgatañca^eb^ dhammajātaṃ, ^b^atītañca^eb^ dhammajātaṃ ^b^visayaṃ^eb^ ārammaṇaṃ karoti, tadā taṃ ñāṇaṃ atītārammaṇaṃ hoti, tadā anāgatārammaṇaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇakāle anāgatagocaraṃ hoti. Dissamānena kāyena tassa bhikkhuno gamane pana sati ^b^tassa^eb^ yogino ñāṇassa gocaro paccuppanno nāma hoti, iti viniddise.

1114. Kāyaṃ cittassa vasena citte āropeti, cittaṃ kāyassa vasena kāye āropeti, iti pariṇāmanakālasmiṃ tassa yogino ñāṇaṃ ajjhattārammaṇaṃ siyā. ^b^Sampavattati sattasū^eb^ti parittamahaggataatītaanāgatapaccuppannaajjhattabahiddhārammaṇasaṅkhātesu ^b^sattasu^eb^ ārammaṇesu sampavattati.
1120.^b^Jānane majjhimāna^eb^nti mahaggatānaṃ jānane.
1122.^b^Etassa^eb^ cetopariyañāṇassa maggārammaṇatā pariyāyena eva ^b^matā^eb^ ñātā.
1126-7.^b^Tattha tikkhaṇasampattaṃ, paccuppannaṃ khaṇādikaṃ^eb^.

^b^Tattha^eb^ tesu paccuppannesu yaṃ paccuppannaṃ khaṇādikaṃ ^b^tikkhaṇasampattaṃ^eb^ uppādaṭṭhitibhaṅgakkhaṇasampattaṃ ^b^khaṇādikaṃ^eb^ khaṇāyeva taṃ khaṇāvayavaṃ paccuppannaṃ nāma. ^b^Ekadvesantativārapariyāpanna^eb^nti ekacittadvicittavīthivārapariyāpannaṃ santatipaccuppannaṃ nāma. ^b^Paccuppannanti pacchima^eb^nti addhāpaccuppannanti attho.

1131-2. Yena ^a^M0.0127^ea^^a^V1.0106^ea^ āvajjanacittena dhamme āvajjati, yena cetasā jānāti, ^b^tesaṃ^eb^ dvinnaṃ āvajjanajavanacittānaṃ sahaṭṭhānassa abhāvā ^b^taṃ^eb^ ‘‘khaṇādikattayaṃ paccuppanna’’ntiādikaṃ ‘‘ekassa cittamekena, avassaṃ pana vijjhati’’iti pariyosānaṃ vacanaṃ na yujjati. Āvajjanajavanānaṃ nānārammaṇabhāvaṃ pattito āpajjanato ca na yujjati. ^b^Aniṭṭhe pana ṭhāne^eb^ tesaṃ āvajjanajavanānaṃ ekārammaṇabhāve anicchite tasmiṃ ṭhāne na yujjati, aññasmiṃ pana ṭhāne maggavīthiyaṃ āvajjanaparikammajavanānaṃ kasiṇādikaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hoti, gotrabhulokuttaracittānañca nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hoti, ettha ārammaṇajavanānaṃ ekārammaṇatā anicchatā.

1134-41. ‘‘Ekabbhavaparicchinnaṃ, paccuppannanti pacchima’’nti vatvā puna aññena pariyāyena taṃ paccuppannaṃ dassetuṃ idaṃ ^b^addhākhyaṃ^eb^ addhānāma paccuppannaṃ javanavārato dīpetabbaṃ. ^b^Iti^eb^ vacanaṃ niddiṭṭhaṃ. Yadā ^b^iddhimā^eb^ yogī parassa cittaṃ ñātuṃ āvajjati, tassa āvajjanamano ^b^paccuppannakhaṇavhayaṃ^eb^ paccuppannaṃ manodvārāvajjanacittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā ^b^tena^eb^ cittena saddhiṃ nirujjhati, tesu niruddhesu tassa yogino cattāri, pañca vā javanāni jāyanti. ^b^Etesaṃ^eb^ catunnaṃ, pañcannaṃ javanānaṃ yaṃ pacchimaṃ cittaṃ iddhicittamudīritaṃ. Iddhicittato ^b^sesāni^eb^ kāmāvacaracittāni. ^b^Etesaṃ^eb^ kāmāvacare iddhijavanānaṃ tadeva ca paracittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hoti yasmā, ^b^tasmā sabbāni tāni^eb^ javanāni ekārammaṇataṃ yanti, tesaṃ javanānaṃ nānārammaṇatā addhāvasā na bhaveyya, paccuppannārammaṇato tesaṃ javanānaṃ ekārammaṇabhāvepi iddhimānasameva ca parassa cittaṃ jānāti. ^b^Itarāni^eb^ kāmāvacarāni pana cittāni parassa cittaṃ na jānanti. ^b^Yathā cakkhudvāre tu viññāṇa^eb^nti cakkhuviññāṇaṃ rūpaṃ passati, tathā itaraṃ cittaṃ na passati.
1161.^b^Anāgataṃsañāṇassā^eb^ti ^a^M0.0128^ea^ anāgataṃsañāṇassa anāgataṃ dhammaṃ agocaraṃ, gocaraṃ na hotiyevāti attho.
1169. Vividhatthāni vaṇṇapadāni yasmiṃ so ^b^vividhatthavaṇṇapado,^eb^ taṃ madhuratthamatinīharaṃ uttamaṃ sotujanassa hadayaṃ pītikaraṃ sacetano ko nāma manujo na suṇeyya.
Iti abhidhammāvatāraṭīkāya
Abhiññārammaṇaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
Sattarasamo paricchedo.
1175.^b^Yā^eb^^a^V1.0107^ea^^b^sañjānanamattaṃva, saññā nīlādito panā^eb^ti sā saññā nīlādivasena sañjānanamattaṃva karoti. ^b^Lakkhaṇappaṭivedha^eb^nti aniccādilakkhaṇapaṭibujjhanaṃ.
1177.^b^Taṃ^eb^ viññāṇaṃ ^b^ussakkitvā^eb^ uddhaṃ sakkaṃ katvā satte maggaṃ pāpetuṃ na sakkoti.
1178-9. Sabbesaṃ pana dhammānaṃ ^b^sabhāvapaṭivedhanaṃ^eb^ aviparītavasena paṭibujjhanaṃ paññāya lakkhaṇaṃ.
1180. Samādhi āsannakāraṇaṃ etāyāti ^b^samādhāsannakāraṇā^eb^.
1181.^b^Lakkhaṇenekadhā^eb^ti sabbadhammaṃ paṭibujjhanalakkhaṇena paññāva ekadhā vuttā.
1183.^b^Bhūripaññenā^eb^ti ^a^M0.0129^ea^ bhūte atthe aviparīte atthe ramatīti bhūri, bhūri paññā etassāti bhūripañño, tena.

1186-91. Tīsu atthadhammaniruttīsu ca ñāṇesu atthadhammaniruttīsu jātesu ñāṇesu ca ñāṇaṃ. Yaṃ kiñci paccayuppannaṃ phalaṃ dhammajātaṃ. ^b^Bhāsitattho^eb^ti pāḷiyā attho. ^b^Ete pañca^eb^ dhammā ^b^atthasaññitā^eb^ atthanāmakā. ^b^Phalanibbattako hetū^eb^ti jananako paccayo. ^b^Bhāsita^eb^nti pāḷi. ^b^Dhammasaññitā^eb^ti dhammanāmakā. ^b^Sabhāvaniruttī^eb^ti aviparītavohāro. ^b^Pariyattī^eb^ti sikkhanaṃ. Savanādhigamehi ^b^pubbayogena^eb^ pubbe pavattanāya.
1192.^b^Bhūmibhūtesū^eb^ti vipassanāya bhūmibhūtesu.
1194.^b^Jananādito^eb^ti ^a^V1.0108^ea^ jātiādito bhītena paññā bhāvetabbā.
1203.^b^Ekāsītiyā cittenā^eb^ti lokuttaracittavajjitena vipassanābhūmibhūtena ekāsītiyā cittena.
1208.^b^Sattasammohaghātattha^eb^nti sattoti sammohassa vināsitatthaṃ.
1211.^b^Nirīhaka^eb^nti īhavirahitaṃ byāpāravirahitaṃ, dārurajjusamāyoge.
1215.^b^Ubho bhijjanti paccayā^eb^ti aññamaññapaccayakāraṇā.
1225.^b^Antadvaya^eb^nti kāmasukhallikānuyogaattakilamathānuyogadvayaṃ. ^b^Bhāvaye^eb^ti diṭṭhivisuddhiṃ vaḍḍheyya.
Iti abhidhammāvatāraṭīkāya
Diṭṭhivisuddhiniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
Aṭṭhārasamo paricchedo.
1231. Iccevamādibāttiṃsakoṭṭhāsānaṃ ^a^M0.0130^ea^ paccayassa hetupaccaye tāva yogī manasā pariggaṇhāti.
1233.^b^Hetvaṅkurassa bījaṃ tu^eb^ bījaṃ aṅkurassa hetujanakaṃ, pathavādayo aṅkurassa paccayā.
1234.^b^Pañca^eb^^a^V1.0109^ea^^b^dhammā^eb^ti avijjātaṇhupādānakammāhārā hetupaccayā dhammā.
1235. Kammaṃ puttassa janako pitā viya nāmarūpassa janakaṃ.
1238.^b^Paccayā^eb^ti paccayena.
1240.^b^Yā sā^eb^ti yā sā kaṅkhā. ^b^Pubbante^eb^ pubbakoṭṭhāse.
1241.^b^Sabbathā^eb^ sabbakoṭṭhāsato anavasesāva tassa yogino ^b^sā^eb^ kaṅkhā ^b^pahiyyati^eb^ nāsīyate.
1243.^b^Atthasādhikā^eb^ti kusalapakkhe dānādiatthasādhikā, akusalapakkhe pāṇātipātādiatthasādhikā.
^b^Taṃ vipāka^eb^nti upaghātakakammassa taṃ vipākaṃ uppannaṃ nāma hoti. Evaṃ eko yogī kammavipākavasena nāmarūpassa paccayapariggahaṃ karoti.
1246.^b^Hetuphalassa sambandhavasenā^eb^ti hetuphalasambandhavasena idaṃ nāmarūpaṃ ^b^kevalaṃ^eb^ ekantena pavattati, iti ^b^sammā^eb^ aviparītākārena saṃ anupassati.
1247. Pākappavattito ^a^M0.0131^ea^ uddhaṃ pākapaṭivedakaṃ ^b^na passati^eb^ na jāniyate.

1250-1.^b^Appavatti^eb^ nāma ^b^na dissati,^eb^ upapannaṃ dissati. Titthiyā etamatthaṃ ^b^anaññāya^eb^ ajānitvā ^b^asayaṃvasī sattasañña^eb^nti ‘‘satto’’ti saññaṃ gahetvāna sassataucchedadassino aññamaññaṃ virodhino hutvā dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhiṃ gaṇhanti.
1254.^b^Ubho^eb^ti ubho kammavipākā aññamaññato suññā. ^b^Na ca kammaṃ vinā phala^eb^nti kammaṃ vinā phalaṃ na ca hoti.
1255.^b^Sambhārehī^eb^ti ^a^V1.0110^ea^ sūriyādisambhārehi.
1257. Suññaṃ ^b^taṃ^eb^ nāmarūpadhammaṃ.
1258.^b^Hetusambhārapaccayā^eb^ti hetunā ca sambhārapaccayehi ca.
Iti abhidhammāvatāraṭīkāya
Kaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhiniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
Ekūnavīsatimo paricchedo.
1264.^b^Paccuppannassa dhammassā^eb^ti paccuppannassa nāmarūpadhammassa.

1266-8.^b^Uppajjato^eb^ uppajjantassa nāmarūpadhammassa ^b^rāsito^eb^ nicayato āgamanañca natthi. ^b^Disāgamana^eb^nti disāya gamanaṃ ^a^M0.0132^ea^. ^b^Niruddhassāpi^eb^ nāmarūpadhammassa ekasmiṃ ṭhāne nicayoti ca natthi.

1270-1. Avijjāsamudayā rūpasamudayo, avijjānirodhā rūpanirodho. Taṇhāsamudayā rūpasamudayo, taṇhānirodhā rūpanirodho. Kammasamudayā rūpasamudayo, kammanirodhā rūpanirodho. Āhāranirodhā rūpanirodho. ^b^Dhamme^eb^ti saṅkhāradhamme.
1280.^b^Sampattapaṭivedhassā^eb^ti sampattalokuttarasaṅkhātamaggaphalassa sotāpannādipuggalassa. ^b^Vippaṭipannassā^eb^ti paṭipattiyaṃ appaṭipannassa, viruddhavasena paṭipannassa vā.
1286.^b^Kāyacittānī^eb^ti ^a^V1.0111^ea^^b^kāyā^eb^ti vedanāsaññāsaṅkhārā. ^b^Citta^eb^nti viññāṇaṃ.
1290.^b^Yato yato^eb^ paccayādito. Yaṃ ^b^amataṃ^eb^ nibbānaṃ ^b^vijānataṃ^eb^ vijānantānaṃ pītipāmojjaṃ, tehi labhitabbaṃ amataṃ, amataṃ viya pītipāmojjaṃ vā.
1293.^b^Appatte^eb^ti attani maggaphalasmiṃ appatte. ^b^Pattasaññī^eb^ti maggaphale ahaṃ patto asmi iti saññito hoti.
1297.^b^Sāravedino^eb^ti sārajānanasīlā. ^b^Ta^eb^nti taṃ maggāmaggañāṇadassanaṃ. ^b^Idaṃ^eb^ ñāṇaṃ ^b^maggāmaggañāṇadassananti^eb^ maggāmaggañāṇadassanaṃ nāma.
Iti abhidhammāvatāraṭīkāya
Maggāmaggañāṇadassanavisuddhiniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
Vīsatimo paricchedo.
1299.^b^Upallesavimuttaṃ^eb^^a^M0.0133^ea^^b^suvisadaṃ ñāṇa^eb^nti aṭṭhavidhañāṇaṃ sandhāyāha.
1302. Saccānulomañāṇanti ayameva pavuccati.
1306. Ayaṃ sikhāpattā vipassanā eva saccānulomañāṇaṃ nāma pavuccati.
1309.^b^Bhavaṅgānantaraṃ saṅkhāru-pekkhāgatanayenā^eb^ti bhavaṅgānantaraṃ saṅkhārupekkhāsaṅkhātena ñāṇena katanayena.

1314-6.^b^Bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṃ^eb^^a^V1.0112^ea^, ^b^uddhañca anulomato^eb^ti uddhaṃ vattamānānaṃ bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṃ anulomato, ^b^idaṃ^eb^ anulomañāṇaṃ vuṭṭhānagāminiyā pariyosānaṃ nāma ^b^bhāsitaṃ^eb^ mahesinā kathitaṃ. Saccānulomañāṇaṃ āhacca uppannā, sabbappakārena gotrabhupariyosānaṃ.
1318.^b^Tatthā^eb^ti vipassanāya.
Iti abhidhammāvatāraṭīkāya
Paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhiniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
Ekavīsatimo paricchedo.

1319-22. Āvajjanassa hitaṃ āvajjaniyaṃ, taṃ ṭhānaṃ etassāti āvajjaniyaṭhānaṃ, gotrabhūti attho. Taṃ gotrabhucittaṃ ^a^M0.0134^ea^ maggacittassa ^b^āvajjaniyaṭhānattā^eb^. Paṭipadāñāṇadassanaṃ kudācanaṃ na ca bhajati, tatheva ñāṇadassanavisuddhiṃ kudācanaṃ na bhajateva. ^b^Ubhinnaṃ^eb^ ñāṇānaṃ antarā ekaṃ ^b^abbohārikaṃ^eb^ vohāre niyuttanti vohārikaṃ, na vohārikaṃ abbohārikaṃ. Vipassanāya sotasmiṃ vipassanāya sote patitattā vipassanā nāma voharitabbā. ^b^Tato^eb^ nibbānato.
1325.^b^Sūraṃ tikkhaṃ vipassana^eb^nti gotrabhucittaṃ sandhāyāha.

1326-9.^b^Visaṅkhāra^eb^nti saṅkhārehi vigataṃ. ^b^Paṭhamāvajjanañcevā^eb^ti paṭhamāvajjanaṃ viya. ^b^Paṭhamābhogatāpi cā^eb^ti paṭhamamanasikārā viya. Maggassa anantarādīhi paccayehi. ^b^Tassā^eb^ti maggassa. Sikhāpattāya tāya vipassanāya ^b^muddhamhi^eb^ matthake. ^b^Anāvatta^eb^nti anivattaṃ.

1330-3. Ekena ^a^V1.0113^ea^ āvajjanena ekissāyeva vīthiyā. ^b^Anulomagotrabhucetasa^eb^nti anulomagotrabhucittānaṃ nānārammaṇatā vuttā. ^b^Taṃ^eb^ gotrabhucittaṃ anāvajjanampi maggassa āvajjanaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā. ^b^Saññaṃ datvā viyā^eb^ti ‘‘ahaṃ nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karomi, tvampi tamevārammaṇaṃ karohi’’ iti saññaṃ datvā viyāti adhippāyo. ^b^Saññita^eb^nti saññaṃ. ^b^Kadācipi anibbiddhapubbaṃ maggo esa^eb^ eso maggo pubbe anibbiddhapubbo.
1336.^b^Ujjhatī^eb^ti chindati.
1338. Anekesaṃ ānisaṃsānaṃ dāyakena ādimaggena saṃyuttaṃ. Paṭhamamaggañāṇaṃ.

1341.^b^Ekassāsevanaṃ^eb^^a^M0.0135^ea^^b^natthi^eb^ ekassa cittuppādassa āsevanapaccayo natthi, ^b^tasmā^eb^ kāraṇā ^b^dve^eb^ cittuppādā anulomakā. ^b^Tehī^eb^ti cittuppādehi āsevanapaccayaṃ ^b^laddhā^eb^ labhitvā ^b^tatiyaṃ^eb^ cittaṃ gotrabhu hoti.

1345-7. Maggapekkhanahetu yassa āvajjanamanaso, taṃ ^b^maggapekkhanahetukaṃ^eb^. ^b^Tasmiṃ niruddhe^eb^ti tasmiṃ āvajjanacitte niruddhe maggassa paccavekkhaṇasaññitāni satta javanāni paṭipāṭiyā jāyante. Paccavekkhaṇañāṇāni ekūnavīsati honti.
1351.^b^Tato^eb^ tadā vipassanāvīthiṃ otarati. Dutiyamaggañāṇaṃ.
1361.^b^Mūlaghāta^eb^nti mūlaghātanaṃ. Tatiyamaggañāṇaṃ.
1363.^b^Anāvattisabhāvato^eb^ti anivattato. Catutthamaggañāṇaṃ.
Iti abhidhammāvatāraṭīkāya
Ñāṇadassanavisuddhiniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
Dvāvīsatimo paricchedo.
1375.^b^Idha^eb^^a^V1.0114^ea^^b^pana^eb^ imasmiṃ panādhikāre ^b^kāraṇūpacārena^eb^ lābhādikāraṇassa vohārena, lābho ādi vatthu yassa anunayassāti ^b^lābhādivatthuko,^eb^ tassa.
^b^Sukhumā^eb^ti kāmarāgapaṭighā sukhumā.

1376.^b^Yena^eb^^a^M0.0136^ea^^b^yena^eb^ paṭhamamaggādiñāṇena ^b^yo yo^eb^ saṃyojanādiko pahātabbo ^b^dhammo ghātaṃ^eb^ vināsaṃ yāti, ^b^so so^eb^ dhammo ^b^tena tena asesena^eb^ ñāṇena evaṃ sādhu mayā sandassito.
1383.^b^Pariññābhisamayenā^eb^ti paricchinditvā jānanena. ^b^Dukkhaṃ abhisametī^eb^ti dukkhaṃ paṭivijjhati.

1394.^b^Yo^eb^ yogī ^b^imaṃ viditvā hitabhāvanaṃ vanaṃ^eb^ vanetabbaṃ ^b^viditvā^eb^ jānitvā ^b^ve^eb^ ekantena sukhasaṃhitaṃ hitaṃ upeti, cittassa tamaṃ ^b^anuttamaṃ^eb^ hīnaṃ ^b^vidhūya^eb^ vināsetvā ^b^aviggahakampadaṃ padaṃ^eb^ aviggahakaṃ sarīrarahitaṃ padaṃ paṭipajjitabbaṃ ñātabbaṃ ^b^padaṃ^eb^ nibbānaṃ ^b^upeti^eb^ pāpuṇāti ca.
Iti abhidhammāvatāraṭīkāya
Kilesapahānaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
Tevīsatimo paricchedo.
1395.^b^Rūpaṃ^eb^^a^V1.0115^ea^^b^rūpassā^eb^ti rūpaṃ rūpassa. ^b^Arūpassa^eb^ nāmassa.
1396.^b^Missakassā^eb^ti nāmarūpamissakassāti attho.
1397.^b^Tipañca cā^eb^ti pannarasa ca.
1399.^b^Eko^eb^ti ^a^M0.0137^ea^ kammapaccayo. ^b^Dvekāliko^eb^ti atītapaccuppannakālavasena dvīsu kālesu niyutto. ^b^Dassito^eb^ti bhagavatā desito.
Iti abhidhammāvatāraṭīkāya
Paccayaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
Catuvīsatimo paricchedo.

1401.^b^Sumatimativicārabodhano^eb^ti sumatīnaṃ sundarapaññānaṃ kavīnaṃ matiyā vicārassa bodhano. ^b^Vimativimohavināsano^eb^ti vimatīnaṃ bālānaṃ vimohassa vināsano. ^b^Kumatimatimahātamonāso^eb^ti kumatīnaṃ bālānaṃ mahātamasannibhāya matiyā nāsako. ^b^Paṭumatibhāsakaro^eb^ti paṭūnaṃ paṇḍitānaṃ tikkhapaññāya obhāsakaro.

1402.^b^Sumatināmako^eb^ bhikkhu ^b^asamānato^eb^ asadisāya pūjāya mama āyācito ^b^yato^eb^ yasmā ^a^V1.0116^ea^ kāraṇā, ^b^tato^eb^ tasmā kāraṇā ayaṃ abhidhammāvatāro. ^b^Padāto padā^eb^ti koṭṭhāsato koṭṭhāsato. ^b^Hitavibhāvanā bhāvanā^eb^ti hitappakāsanāya bhāvanāya mayā racito. Atha vā ahaṃ sumatinā bhikkhunā asamānato mānato āyācito ^b^yato^eb^ yasmā, ^b^tato^eb^ tasmā.
1405.^b^Tividhā byappathānañhi gatiyo^eb^ti byappathānaṃ vacanānaṃ atthaganthayuttivasena tividhā gatiyo.
1406.^b^Nikāyantaraladdhīhī^eb^ti aññasmiṃ nikāye laddhīhi. ^b^Vācanāmagganissito^eb^ti vacanappabandhanissito.
1410.^b^Asaṃkiṇṇakulākule^eb^ti ^a^M0.0138^ea^ asammissakulehi ākiṇṇe. ^b^Supasannasitodake^eb^ti madhurasītodake.
1411.^b^Saṅkaṭe^eb^ti sambādhe.
1412.^b^Kelāsasikharākārapāsādapaṭimaṇḍite^eb^ti rajatapabbatamatthakanibhehi pāsādehi alaṅkate.
1413.^b^Vividhākāracārupākāragopure^eb^ti vividhasaṇṭhānamanuññapākāradvārakoṭṭhake.
1414.^b^Sallekhā^eb^ti sallekhavutti. ^b^Sākhalye^eb^ti sakhilabhāve. ^b^Satā^eb^ti satisampannena.
1415.^b^Vassavalāhakā devā^eb^ti vassavalāhakabhūtā devā amarā.
Nigamanakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
Abhidhammāvatārapurāṇaṭīkā niṭṭhitā.
Namo tassa bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa
